returning_collector_encounter.title: Průzkumník přichází do tvého města.
returning_collector_encounter.trade_details: Zdravím [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! Jsem průzkumník z velké dálky na východě, který zabývá nejrůznějšími obchody a sbíraním věcí. Nedávno jsem našel [str(i18n_data.reward_number)]x [str(i18n_data.reward_item)] jenom se povalující vedle cesty. Nejsem si jistý, kdo je tam nechal, ale jsou docela nápomocní při uklidu! Já pro ně nemám moc velké využití, ale v blízké vesnice říkali, že by potřebovali [str(i18n_data.want_number)]x [str(i18n_data.want_item)]. Budo odpočívat někde poblíž po [str(i18n_data.num_days)] dny/i... Budeš pak mít zájem o obchod?
returning_collector_encounter.waiting_text: Průzkumník bude zpátky za [str(i18n_data.hour_counter)] [str(i18n_data.period)], aby ti dal [str(i18n_data.reward_number)]x [str(i18n_data.reward_item)], pokud pro něj budeš mít připravené [str(i18n_data.want_number)]x [str(i18n_data.want_item)] !
returning_collector_encounter.return_greetings_positive: Jsem zpátky! Vypadá to že si pro mě udělal [str(i18n_data.want_number)]x [str(i18n_data.want_item)] jak jsem tě žádal. Pořád máš zájem to směnit za [str(i18n_data.reward_number)]x  [str(i18n_data.reward_item)]? Ujišťuji tě, že jsou mnohem užitečnější v nošení věcí, než jakýkoliv normální člověk!
returning_collector_encounter.return_greetings_negative: Jsem zpátky, ale nevypadá to, že by si pro mě udělal [str(i18n_data.want_number)] [str(i18n_data.want_item)], jak jsem tě žádal. No dobře, možná někdo v naší vesnici pro ně najde využití.

unlock_windchimes.bulletin_title: Tesařovi se odemkl návod na Větrnou Zvonkohru!

bulletin_message.000: Bojíte se, udatní měšťané? Ogo tak-zvaný-šéf tu brzy bude. Pro vás.

erdene_appears.bulletin_title: U ohně se objevila postava se sykavým hlasem

bulletin_message.000: Půjčit si sílu, abys povstal, znamená, padnout, když síla selže. Ogovi nepropůjčuje sílu jeho  tak-zvaný-věštěc, ale dítě které ukradl.
Já? Já jsem ta co sleduje. Vás. Jeho. Pro hvězdu. Pro osud.
bulletin_message.001: Já? Já patřím k Rudé Peci. Bylo bychom vaši zachránci, ale váš Cid tvrdě vyjdnával ve váš prospěch. Takže teď sledujeme. A čekáme na ten den kdy vyjde vaše hvězda.
bulletin_message.002: Já! Mám dojem, že si to zasloužíte. Jsem žhavík v kovářské výhni, jiskra ve vzduchu. Sleduji, abych věděla, kdy je ten správný čas, pro to aby nás pohltil oheň.
bulletin_message.003: Já? Dnes, nezáleží na tom. Zítra, pokud stále budete naživu, my můžete říkat Erdene, z Rudé Pece.

erdene_description.bulletin_title: Usmála se, až se jí zablýskly zuby.

bulletin_message.000: Bojuj statečně, městečko. Osud je bezvýznamný. Ale kdyby tomu tak nebylo, váš by byl, abyste povstali.

Na tomto papíře, najdete ukolébavku, kterou ukonejšíte duši Hory. Najděte ukradenou flétnu. Přikaž svému dřevařovi ať ji nastaví na tuto melodii. Postav ji do cesty Ogovu velkému zlobrovi a sleduj jak namyšlenost dojde svojí spravedlivé odměny.
Tak tedy. Bojuj statečně, městečko.
Věštecká magie! Mluv s předky! Předvídej budoucnost! Vidí... vidí Pád Červené Pece, nová hvězda vychází. Ta hvězda je Ogo. Tentokrát, si vybíráme výtěznou stranu!
bulletin_message.001: Věštec starý, starý had. Mluví s pomocí  kostí a vah. Vidí budoucnost! Vidí konec koloběhu, konec jednou provždy. Nejsem si jistý co tím myslí, ale dobře pro Oga!
bulletin_message.002: Goblin věštec, samozřejmě! Goblin, který vidí budoucnost! Říká že staří vymírají, nová hvězda vychází. Dobré pro Oga, špatné pro všechny ostatní, tebe nevyjímaje!

bulletin_message.000: Hola, mrňavé městečko! Mám tady pro vás špatnou novinu!
bulletin_message.001: Mrňavé Městečko! Ukloň se a třes se!
bulletin_message.002: Chachachá! Tohle? Tohle je vaše město? Směju se, až z toho brečím!

snooty_introduction.bulletin_title: Goblin s nepříjemným šklebem se šourá do města

bulletin_message.000: Z rozhodnutí Oga Lebkomlátiče, Goblina-Budoucího-Šéfa-Všech, vy a všechny vaše věci jste od teď v područí Velké Třpytivé Armády a Říše Červené Pece!
bulletin_message.001: Já vyslanec Oga Lebkomlátiče, zkrotitele Hor! Ogo vyžaduje množství věcí od všech, včetně vás, včetně vašeho zlata!
bulletin_message.002: Můj Šéf-Šéfů, Ogo Lebkomlátič, brzy vzít Třpytivou Armádu a vládnout všem z Červené Pece! Vy další z mnoha dobytí. Vy se stanete našimi zásobovači zlatem!
bulletin_message.003: Já jsem goblin Vlajkonoš Oga Lebkomlátiče, jezdce Hory! Můj Pán požadovat poplatky, ve formě všeho co ty mít! Ty dát vše! Nebo ty zaplatit!
bulletin_message.004: Já goblin Vlajkonoš Oga Lebkomlátiče! Když jste překonali malé náčelníky, vy upoutat pozornost Ogova Oka! A Ogovo Oko ví vše! Vy dát poplatky nebo oko uvidět váš konec!

bulletin_message.000: Věštec říká Ogo Lebkomlátič bude hrdinou nadevšemi hrdiny! Vy předurčeni dát mu zlato!
bulletin_message.001: Věštec malý, ale mít velké myšlenky! Věštec nikdy nechybovat. Veštec říkat, vy dát Ogovi zlato, jinak Ogo vzít zlato sám!
bulletin_message.002: Goblini bít dlouho zapomenti a vyhýbáni. Věštec říkat, že Ogo Lebkomlátič, můj MalýŠéf, brzy všechno změnit! Proto potřebuje zlato a práci!
bulletin_message.003: Ogo Lebkomlátič, Pán Pánů, mít velký osud, být vládnout nade všemi! Tak to říkat věštec; věštec nikdy nechybovat. Věštec říkat, vy být pomáhat!

bulletin_message.000: Každopádně, na tom nezáležet! Já tady jenom abych vy varovat: shromážděte svoje zlato tak, aby pro nás bilo jednodušší ho vyzvednout! My být brzy zpátky!
bulletin_message.001: Hahaha! To je jedno. Odteď patříte nám. My příjít brzy vyzvednout vás pro zlaté doly!
bulletin_message.002: Oh, vy něco říkáte? Záleží ne, my vrátit brzy! Seberte si všechny věci, abi pro nás bylo snadné se přesunout!
bulletin_message.003: Každopádně, čas jít vyžehlit můj prapor. Bít brzy zpátky! Buďte připravení, jo? Nový život pod vládou goblinů čekat!

bulletin_message.000: Dobrá zprává pro vás, ubozí človíčkové! Ogo Lebkomlátič, Budoucí-Šéf-Šéfů, nás volá domů na klanovou radu. Byla sranda tu s vámi bít! Možná my říct kámošům, brzy zpátky pro víc srandy při braní vašich věcí!
bulletin_message.001: Lidi nebýt výzva. Moc smtuný. My doufat že vrátit domů k našemu Šéfovi-Šéfů, Ogovi Lebkomlátičovi s příběhem o naší slávě, ale poražení vás není žádná sláva. Možná se my vrátit, když vy silnější.
bulletin_message.002: Už odcházíme, človíčkové. Ale zase se vrátíme, a s námi přijde zákon!
bulletin_message.003: Nu, byla sranda okrádat vás, ubozí človíčkové! Ale sranda někdy musí skončit, my teď jít domů na velkou klanovou radu. Zatímco my pryč, vy postavte víc věcí, abichom až se vrátíme, si toho mohli víc vzít!

bulletin_message.000: Hahaha! Přesně. Tohle je pro vás, vzpomínka na naše přátelství.

loot_final.bulletin_title: Goblin něco velice opatrně pokládá na zem

bulletin_message.000: Vy moc vtipní. Protože my přátelé, já říct vám: Ogo dost super. Trochu zlý. Jednou sníst štěně. Ale... věštec říkat, že on předurčený! Určený k dupaní po všech! Já jen malý pívo, víte? Nicméně vy menší. Každopádně.
Dobré zprávy, holoto! Ogo Lebkomlátič, Budoucí-Šéf-Šéfů, nás volá zpátky. Čas jít domů, vzdát mu čest! Jesli vy mít štěstí, možná mi přijít zpátky na návštěvu... brzy!

bulletin_message.00: Je tu docela klid, ale víš ty co...? Když ptáci přestanou zpívat, tak je to špatné znamení.

Můj odhad jsou vlci. Gobliní vlci. Hlídejte si hranice. Nechcete s nimi bojovat po tom, co je jejich krotitel seřeže do latě, slyšíte? Opevněte se, jestli potřebujete. A nebo utečte. Útěk je v pohodě! Není žádná hanba přežít další den.
Ahoj, městečko! Jak se tu máte?

msg1.bulletin_title: Ošlehaná cestovatelka se objevuje na obzoru

bulletin_message.000: --ten kdo tě hlídá
Jestli chceš zatočit s vlky dříve než oni zatočí s tebou, zaútoč první.
bulletin_message.001: V lese jsou vlci. Goblinní vlci. Dostaň je než oni dostanou tebe.
bulletin_message.002: Ogovi jednotky jsou v pohybu. V tvém lese jsou vlci.
bulletin_message.003: Malý člověčí tábore: vypátrejte své nepřátele dokud ještě spí.
bulletin_message.004: Goblinní vlci jsou cvičení na to aby zaútočili na rozkaz. Osvoboď je předtím, než jim bude vydán rozkaz a budeš dnes moci klidně spát.

msg1.bulletin_title: Zpráva připevněná na šíp se objevila na tvém praporu

bulletin_message.000: V lesích jsou vlci! Utíkejte dokud ještě můžete!
bulletin_message.001: Copak neslyšíte vytí? V lese jsou goblinní vlci!
bulletin_message.002: Naše družina byla právě napadena gobliny! Prchejte!
bulletin_message.003: Tihle goblinní vlci nejsou jako normální vlci--oni jsou nebojácní, rychlí a... a krvelační! Utečte kdo můžete!
bulletin_message.004: Máte v lesích gobliny! Opevněte se na nějakeém bezpečném místě než na vás zaútočí!

msg1.bulletin_title: Těžce oddechující uprchlíci se objevují na obzoru

bulletin_message.00: Gratulace jsou na místě, jestli je to tedy to na čem ti záleží. Prošla jsem tuhle oblast křížem krážem a vypadát to, že jste to tu vyčistili od většiny goblinů! Neříkám, že neuvidíte nějakého zatoulaného, nebo i dva, kteří vás přijdou obtěžovat, ale dobrá práce, vzato kolem a kolem.
Tady máte dárek, který jsem vyzvedla v pár okolních městech. Díky vám dnes všichn mohou spát klidněji.
Haló? Je pořád někdo doma?
Haf! Haf! AÚÚÚÚÚÚ!!!!!!!
Řekněte mojí ovci... já jí navždy miluji...
Vy vyhrát ne. Ogo... přichází. Věštec říkat... Ogo... rozdrtit všechny...
Au...to bolí...

bulletin_message.000: Chechecheché!! Váše mrňavá osada teď součást Třpytivého Teritoria! Zasloužím si dar ze zlata!
bulletin_message.001: Člověčí holoto! Vy rozumět ne moci Třpytivé Armády! Vy mít štěstí, že vy klanět přede mnou. Taky, chtít nějaké věci kterých se já v noci držet; aby mě uspávat.
bulletin_message.002: Vy mít zásoby? My vzít; My bít v pohodě. Rozumět my si?
bulletin_message.003: Hahahahá, vy zelenáč ve velkém Červeném Teritoriu. To znamená já menší-zelenáč vzít tvůj oběd. Obědová metafora. Vy dělat pro nás. Nebo jinak...
bulletin_message.004: Ty hloupý blb, já velký Třpytivý Náčelník! Zákony přírody říkat, ty dát mi věci a já ne-zny-číí-t ty. Já chtít zásoby. Rozumět?

shakedown.bulletin_title: Goblin s naparáděným kloboukem si vykračuje k městu

bulletin_message.000: Třpytivá Armáda se vrací! Kde jzou věci?
bulletin_message.001: Moje věci! Kde jzou?
bulletin_message.002: My zpátky. Vy zaplatit poplatky teď. Kde jzou?
bulletin_message.003: Já snít minoulou noc. Ve snu, vy udělat mi věci; my jako bratři jen já zabít ne vás. Mít Věci?
bulletin_message.004: Chtít věci teď. Vy udělat? My bít v pohodě! Vy udělat ne? Vy umřít. My všichni přátelé!

bulletin_message.000: Vy zapomenout věci? Vy udělat ne? Vy plivnout na Čest Třpytivé Armády! Teď vy umřít!
bulletin_message.001: Vy hloupí blbci udělat ne moje věci?! Proklínááám!!! PROKLÍNÁÁÁM VÁS VŠECHNY!!!
bulletin_message.002: Cožéé? Vy mít ne moje věci? SEKAT, BODAT, POM-ŠTÍT!
bulletin_message.003: Já chtít bít dobrý náčelník. Já chtít být přítel! Ale vy poslouchat ne. Ne. Vy bít ne hodni. Já muset zabít vás, než jít domů. Brečet kvůli tomu-co-mohlo-být. Vy brečet taky, bít ne toho, že vy mrtví.

collection_failed.bulletin_title: Goblin se mračí tak, že ani nejsou vidět jeho oči

bulletin_message.000: Tak je to správně. Vy spolupracovat, My spolu vycházet dobře.
bulletin_message.001: Vy opravdu mít věci? Já nikdy--Já chtít říct, dobře. Ty dát mi to co mi náležet.
bulletin_message.002: Vy mít zásoby? My vzít; my bít v pohodě!
bulletin_message.003: Pro mě?! Vy nejlepší z nejlepších, holoto!
bulletin_message.004: Moje věci! Já vzít je hned domů a přitulit k nim se až v noci spát.
bulletin_message.005: Chachachachá!!! Krásné věcičky!! Překrásné věcičky!! Moje. Moje! Moje!!
bulletin_message.007: Moje věci! Hahahá, vy docela dobrý, na to jaká vy bít holota. Brzy se vrátit zpátky!

collection_success.bulletin_title: Goblin je šťastný jako dítě o Mráznocích

bulletin_message.000: Já se brzy vrátit pro věci. Radši je mějte připravené, nebo vás to bude mrzet, malí hearthlingové.
Cožé? Ty říkat ne? Tak to my si vzít vše! SEBERTE JIM VŠECHNO!!!!
bulletin_message.001: Ne, ne ne. Vy máte říct 'Ano.' Vy máte být vděční! Zkusíme to znovu? Ne? Chyba! Já opravovat chyby!
bulletin_message.002: Ne? Mě zavařuje se mozek!! Já zavařit vám!!!
bulletin_message.004: Vy rozumět ne. Alternativa: Smrť. Smmmrrrrrtttť. SMMRRRRTTTTŤ!!!

sighted_bulletin.title: Zloděj!
sighted_bulletin.message: Pšššt, neměl by jsi ho vidět.

campfire.description: Ale... co způsobuje, že je zelený?

ogo.description: Věštec říká, Ogo Vyvolený, Ogo Přerušovač-Koloběhu

bulletin_message.000: Dobrá práce, městečko. Přežijete další noc. Ogo, jeho hora, a jeho věštec zmizeli z povrchu země, ale vy jste tu zůstali. Oslavujete?
Přání měho Chána mě už volají domů. Ať se vám daří, městečko. Pro všechny sobě rovné, zase vyjde slunce.
Z dřeva zrozená a Polárkou vedená, roste kolébka naděje mezi hory vklíněná

Můj Chán zažil spoustu let, ale nemoc se nezajímá o vaši moudrost či čest. Chánova hvězda vyhasla, a jeho muži prohledávají divočinu, aby zvětšili svoji slávu. Ogovo břímě přejde na vás, a oni přijdou.

red_kiln_description.choice_001: Tvůj Chán umřel? To je mi moc líto...

bulletin_message.000: Hrdinové přicházejí, hrdinové odcházejí, ve světle ohně se vždy nacházejí
Kratičký záblesk klenotu v opičí tlapce, znovu zrození hvězdy Bohy předvídané (předpovídali)
Pro velké přichází výzvy velkých. Mocní moc hledají. Moc porazit... znaméná přilákat oči dalších.
Kdo ví? Moji lidé věří... no. Na tom teď nezáleží. Cykly bohů leží mimo zorné pole starostí lidí - ještěřanů, opičího národa a nebo i jiných. Vzhlížej k budoucností, městečko, a vzkvétej.
Rozhoď kosti, Ogův věštec to tak udělal, nad kolébkou této země. Chtěl bys slyšet jeho slova?
Hudba připomenout Hoře jedno teplé a bezpečné místo. S jídlem a ohněm. Já dát ti tohle jako poděkování.
Ogo copak ty neslyšet zvonkohru? Jako stará vzpomínka! Já už víc nechtít bojovat.

mountain_notices.bulletin_title: Hora, Zlobr pozvedá hlavu aby mohl poslouchat

bulletin_message.000: Ogo???
OGO? VY JSTE ZABILI OGA!!! PÍSEŇ BUDE NA PAMÁTKU PŘÍTELE HORY!!!

mountain_notices_3.bulletin_title: Hora buší do své ohromné hrudi

bulletin_message.000: Horo! Bojuj... dál....
Cože? Ogo Lebkomlátič, poražen? Co říká věštec? Co říká Hora? A co na to Chán? A co teprve... příští koloběh?
Hora, směšný! Tohle je válka! Za shinies! Kupředu!!!
Vidíš Horo? Oni odmítají tvoji nabídku na mír! Obnovit útok!
Ogo copak ty neslyšet zvonkohru? Jako stará vzpomínka! Já už víc nechtít bojovat.

mountain_replies.bulletin_title: Hora, pozvedá hlavu aby mohl poslouchat

bulletin_message.000: Grrrr!!! Ale co zlaťáky?! Fajn. Horo, můj příteli; já jít ne kam on jít ne. Vaše město v bezpečí... alepoň prozatím. My vrátit, až nám nový Chán řekne!
Horo, proč ty přestat bojovat?

ogo_notices.bulletin_title: Ogo Lebkomlátič mává aby upoutal pozornost svého zlobra

bulletin_message.000: Ne. Já už víc nechtít bojovat. A co vy, človíčkové? Když já už se necítit na boj, co vy s tím udělat?
Cože? Člověčí město si troufá vystavit goblinský odznak cti?! Pomstttttaaaaaaaaa!!!!

sighted_bulletin.title: Goblini přicházejí, aby získali zpět svoje odznaky cti!

bulletin_message.000: Seberte všechny věci!!!!
Nakonec, jsme se dostali na místo se spoustou cenností! Kupředu, moji poskoci! Kupředu za slávu Oga Lebkomlátiče!
Za Oga! Za Zlaťáky!

campfire.description: Ale... co způsobuje, že je zelený?

bulletin_message.000: Névratíš zpátky děti lesa? Nepatří totiž do tvých beden a hromad cetek. Vyhovění této žádosti bude odměněno.
bulletin_message.001: Stovky krásných dubů a jalovců padly k zemi aby nasytili chamtivé lidi. Naše trpělivost je už skoro vyčerpaná. Žádám tě, vrať je zpátky tam kam paří - do lesa.
bulletin_message.002: Vrať naše dřevo a pomož navrátit přírodní rovnováhu do této úžasné lesní krajiny. Nemůžu zaručit, že budeš v bezpečí pokud odmítneš .
bulletin_message.003: Naše divočina byla obětována vašemu neumírněnému životnímu stylu. Dáme vám šanci vrátit naše dřevo. Radím vám, vemete si mé varování k srdci..

bulletin_message.000: Jsem hluboce zklamaný... Doporučil bych ti ať se připravíš. Stážci lesa mluví o invazi.
Děkuji ti za tvojí spolupráci. Na oplátku jsme ti připravili dárek.
Buďte podraveni, lidé z městečka [str(i18n_data.town_name)]. Přišel jsem vás varovat o vzrůstajícím neklidu v těchto lesích.
bulletin_message.001: Tiše, jsme vás pozorovali.. už před pádem Ptáka Ohniváka. Proč? Abychom chránili. Naše stromy. Naše semenáčky. Naše lesy.

bulletin_message.000: Vezmeme si tyhle věci zpět

revenge.bulletin_title: Houf entlingů utíká s tvými špalky!

bulletin_message.000: Tady máš, ber to jako projev naší vděčnosti.

simple_message.bulletin_title: Entlingové nesoucí kořist cupitají směrem k tobě

bulletin_message.00: Červená Pec věří, že pokrok může vzejít pouze z střetu mezi sobě rovnými. Chán už tu není. A tam kde jeden padne, ti silnější a mazanější povstanou.
Hej ty tam. Erdene mi o tobě říkala. Říkala, že jsi porazil Oga Lebkomlátiče.

msg1.bulletin_title: Orkský vojvoda přichází do tvého města

bulletin_message.00: Doba jednoha Chána skončila, ale nové světlo vychází za obzorem. Dodržujeme to co Cid přikázal a respektujeme tedy znamení Čtyř Barev. Umísti Gong Zvědů, vytavený tvým zpracovatelem kovů a umísti ho na svém území. Tím ukážeš, že si připraven k boji.
Teď když tu stojím, vidím, že zatím nejsi hoden postavit se třeba i poslednímu z mých náčelníků kempů. Ve tvých očích chybí plamen touhy po mistrovství !
Ty ptát se proč? My dát oběť velké Bohyni Khulganě! Přinést velké bohatství do posmrtného života. Teď ty vědět, ty potřebovat nám dát poklad!

bulletin_message.000: Ty ne dát zlaťáky?! My vzít!!!
bulletin_message.001: Ha, jsme tě jen zkoušeli! Samozřejmě že my bít dost silní na to si vzít!
bulletin_message.002: My vzít všechno zlato! My pomstít se za to roztavení čepice!!

bulletin_message.000: Aj!! Ty všimnout si mě?
bulletin_message.001: Óó zlaťáky! Gong! Smaragd!

msg1.bulletin_title: Kobold dlouze zírá na tvé hromady zlata.

bulletin_message.000: My vidět ty hodně pokladů na hromadách a v bednách. My potřebovat velkou, velkou kořist. Ty sdílet, jo?

bulletin_message.00: My.. moc slabí.. Vyndej Elitní Gong jestli si troufáš..
My dodavatelé. My udělat kemp. Orkové nás platit. Tihle orkové bít posedlí ctí, politikou a hledáním nového Chána. Brzy, oni sem poslat orkskou armádu a my muset čistit znova
Ty rozpoznat? ...Ne, já tě znát ne. Ty říkat my všichni vypadat stejně?!

msg1.bulletin_title: Několik povědomě vypadajících goblinů začíná stavět chatrče blízko tvého města

bulletin_message.000: Ty štěstí my zaneprázdnění! Co my děláme? My stavím chatrče. Sakládáme kemp.
bulletin_message.001: ....My zaneprázdnění, takže my ignorovat a vrátit se zpátky k zakládání kempu.

bulletin_message.000: Och! Já přemýšlet o skvělém nápadu! Ty zaplatit nás místo nich, a my zařídit, že orkové nepřijít! Ty jen potřebovat nám dát nějaké poklady. Ty vyhrát, já vyhrát, oba vyhrát.

shakedown.bulletin_title: Goblinova malá prasečí očka se rozsvítila

bulletin_message.000: My zpjet! Kde je naše blýskavá kořist??

collection_due.bulletin_title: Houf goblinů se líně pachtí zpátky do města

bulletin_message.000: Cože? Ty se rozmyslet? ... Vy lidé tak nehodní našeho času. Teď my muset zase zavolat pitomé orky a získat část výplatního podílu.
bulletin_message.001: Ne má?? My má rodinu ty ví! Ty mrhat náš čas! My říct orkům ať s vámi nemít slitování!

bulletin_message.000: Zlaťáky! Zásoby! Možná tahle práce i lepší než pracovat pro Náčelníka. Díky, člověče. Jestli se na to budete cítit, vyndejte červený Gong Mistrů. Zlobr brát červenou jako výzvu.
bulletin_message.001: Ty tak bát orkských bouchačů? No, dobře pro mě! Nevyndavej červený Gong nebo bi mohli přijít větší pitomější bouchači.
bulletin_message.002: Věcičky!! Ty bys my měl najmout na plný úvazek. Ty ptát co my pro tebe dělat? ..My moci domluvit ve smlouvě. Možná ty nás potřebovat jestli ty vystavit Gong Mistrů a velký zlobr přijít.
bulletin_message.003: Ty dát dobré věci! Moje vlk bít velmi šťastný! Už ty potkat náčelníka zlobrů? Oni mít rádi červenou barvu. Třeba na Gongu. Ty zeptat svůj kovář.

bulletin_message.000: Ty souhlasit s platbou? Dobře, usnadníš nás život. My vrátit se později pro věci. My si teď dát šlofíka...
Ty ne chtít platit? Ok. Nám na tom nezáleží. Pozorně sleduj, armáda orků přijít brzy.

bulletin_message.00: Vaše drahocená Cidova Smlouva vás teď už neochrání, pošetilí lidé!
Mrňavé městečko! Vy vztyčit znamení Rubínu! Vy si troufáte vyzvat mě, Šéfa Gruta Mozkodrtě?!
Nezačněte být arogantní, mrňavý človíčkové! Krajani z hlavního města čekají aby mohli otestovat svoji sílu. Jakékoliv město bearing Vojevůdcův Gong nezůstane nepovšimnuté!
Jak už bylo řečeno, my bychom také neměli být podceňováni. My bojovali s tolika šelmami a stvůrami, že si to ani neumíte představit. Těším se na náš boj.
Je to tak dávno co jsme naposled viděli Purpurový Záblesk Vojevůdcova odznaku. Červené Peci by prospělo bojování s více nepráteli jako jste vy.

msg1.bulletin_title: Jednotka orků pochoduje k tobě v dokonalé synchronizaci

bulletin_message.00: Pro nás, je zde mnoho cest vedoucích k pokroku. Tohle je jen jedna z nich, avšak zdá se býti vcelku úrodnou.

Možná ani nepochopíš jakou šťastnou náhodou, v této politicky nejisté době, je pro nás tahle zkušenost. Ale na tom ne záleží. Vojvoda se s tebou bude chtít znovu setkat. Prozatím, se měj dobře, člověče.
Chválím tě za tvé vítězství. Ukázal jsi se jako zručný a čestný nepřítel.

msg1.bulletin_title: Ork zdvořile poklekne na závěr bitvy

bulletin_message.00: The defeat of my chiefs and warriors demands from us recognition of your strength. Let us contend in battle and the greater of equals shall come forth with honor and valiance.
As I predicted, fate brings us together once more.

msg1.bulletin_title: Warchief Oghar Norwind strides towards you with fearless bravado

bulletin_message.00: I now return home. Word comes to me that, bereft of our Khan's wisdom, our shaman have delved into dark things, long forgotten. They think the mistakes of the past do not apply to them, and I fear for what they may do.
There are still those in my ranks who believe you weak. They will honor the Accord, but put out any gong of the Four Colors and they will gladly return to meet your challenge.

It seems Erdene was right about you, after all. I acknowledge your claim to this land, under Knight Cid's Accord, by your proven strength. We Orcs care only that the land is held secure against the wild and the evil. You have proven yourself worthy of the task.

unlock_blue_token_recipe.bulletin_title: The blacksmith has unlocked the Decorative Elite Gong recipe!

unlock_purple_token_recipe.bulletin_title: The Blacksmith has unlocked the General's Golden Gong recipe!

unlock_red_token_recipe.bulletin_title: The Blacksmith has unlocked the Decorative Master Gong recipe!

bulletin_message.00:
O-oh... how did you? Never mind, it matters not. I shall return to my people with the news that the Titanous scourge can be defeated. This may be what tips events in our favor, away from the treasonous shaman.

My deepest thanks to you, on behalf of my late Khan.

story2.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
I had come to warn you of the Titan lurking under your lands... to beseech your help in eradicating it, but...

...did you already cleanse this land of its sinister presence?

story1.choice_000: Oh, yeah, we got rid of it a while ago.

bulletin_message.00: Valiant humans, who have proven your strength, I greet you now as equals. This domain is yours by right, and your star glints all the brighter. Yours is a promising fortune indeed!

greet.bulletin_title: Erdene of the Red Kiln returns, anxious
greet.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00: I come with a request of the utmost urgence, there is... wait...

intro.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
My request of you: A fragment of the evil that brought low the Phoenix Empire has coalesced here, beneath your feet.

Left unchallenged, it will sleep for generations yet, growing in strength, stifling and corrupting the magic of this land.

Awaken this Titan now, though, and it will have no choice but to expend its gathered energy in a final battle against your settlement. Withstand its wrath, and it will be snuffed out for good, and your descendants will live in peace.

My shamans devised this Gong - take it and place it. When you are prepared, let it ring aloud, and it will rouse the slumbering Titan.

You will be beset by horrors for days, perhaps weeks - but a fragmented evil cannot sustain itself. Outlast. Strike at its minions, dig up its roots, drive off its tendrils. Every small victory will weaken it.

Persevere, and the Titan will fall, and a small part of the calamity of the Phoenix Empire finally undone.

Be an example for my people that this evil can be faced and destroyed - that we need not enslave ourselves to it. Please.

accept1.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Below is wrong. Snake knows this. Rabbit knows this. Monkey knows this, too. But, power seeks power.

The Phoenix, they found whispers of power below. They dug with picks and found clues, they dug with minds and found knowledge.

Knowledge without wisdom is peril.

story2.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Farewell, brave Humans. May your star shine ever brighter, and be a guide to all through the coming night.

[You can find the Gong lying near your Banner, or in your inventory under 'Decorations']

farewell.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
It is a tale passed from Speaker to Speaker, of when Monkey first rose to prominence. From Monkey came humans, and those humans united.

They built an Empire, spreading from the center outwards until it encompassed the entire continent. As their grand central capital stretched up into the sky, the humans’ ambition led them below...

story1.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
No, I suppose not. The Titan will stay asleep for generations, your settlement is not at risk.

Perhaps I was wrong to burden you with a task that is rightfully mine. My apologies. I withdraw now, to tend to my own people.

I will leave behind this specially-prepared Gong - in the event you change your mind, simply place it and you shall be further enlightened.

Farewell, humans.

In time, the darkness subsided, but now it saturates the earth, whispering to those who will listen. We Orcs tested your town’s strength not just for glory, but to prove that you have the will to resist this evil and its corruption.

Although, without a Khan to guide them, the shaman of the Red Kiln now seek to re-form this titanic evil, to control it.

I must stop them - it was my Khan’s last wish. But, this is for me and my kind to do.

Of you, I ask a favor.

story5.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00: Valiant humans, who have proven your strength, I greet you now as equals. This domain is yours by right, and your star glints all the brighter. Yours is a promising fortune indeed!

greet.bulletin_title: Erdene of the Red Kiln returns, anxious
greet.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Humans fled, receding to the edges of the world, and held on by their very fingertips until the darkness quieted itself.

Orcs, like all of Snake’s children, stayed and fought. Fought the corrupted, fought through famine and hardship. Whether through noble courage or foolish pride, I know not.

The Rabbits, already in decline, burrowed deep, forsaking the surface world.

story4.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
A great evil was awakened, this we know. The capital was lost, obliterated, and the world surely doomed. But, there was some hero, some sacrifice, lost to time. It was enough. Not enough to destroy the evil, but enough to break it apart.

It dissipated like fog across the land, turning the forces of nature against its inhabitants, withering crops and fraying minds.

story3.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
I… come also with a request. I fear for my people.

Have you heard of the Phoenix Empire? Of its end?

intro.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
[Select the Gong and Press the 'Awaken Titan' button when you're ready. Killing or destroying the Titan's minions, tentacles, and roots will all reduce its health.]

[Good luck!]

msg2.bulletin_title: A scrawled note, attached to the Sinister Gong

bulletin_message.00:
Only sound this gong when prepared - your town will be cut off from the world for days.

Corrupted creatures will surely appear - face them in combat if you can, hole up and hide if you cannot. There is no shame in survival. Be vigilant for citizens being trapped, buildings being threatened, and be prepared to dig.

Every small victory will sap away the Titan's strength - attempt no direct attack, it is out of reach and a mere apparition.

Stand strong in driving away its corruption, and you will emerge victorious.

msg1.bulletin_title: A scrawled note, attached to the Sinister Gong

bulletin_message.00:
Excellent! We Orcs aren't quite as talented in the crafts as you are, but my disciple has proven themselves a fierce warrior, and I'm sure they will make themselves useful however else they can!

Farewell, brave Humans, until a future day has dawned!

accept2.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
I should add... due to your exceptional bravery, some of my people have gone beyond simply respecting you as Humans, to now truly consider you as Orc.

Some even wish to emmigrate and become members of your tribe.

request1.choice_000: Orcs want to join my town?

bulletin_message.00: Wonderful! So, this Orc disciple may join your tribe?

accept1.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Very well. The news is sure to disappoint my disciple, but your tribe and its wishes deserve our utmost respect.

Farewell, brave Humans, until another day has dawned.

reject2.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
By the Khan's blessed name, you've done it!

I came as quickly as I could - I could feel the change in the winds even from the Red Kiln territories.

greet.bulletin_title: Erdene of the Red Kiln returns, joyous
greet.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Oh, I see... and I understand. If I were standing in your stead, I could not so easily accept a Human into the ranks of the Red Kiln, either.

That said, are you sure my disciple does not have a place here?

reject1.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln

bulletin_message.00:
Yes! In fact, the Titan's defeat has cleansed that sinister Gong I brought you, along with your lands. That Gong shall stand as testament of my people's enduring respect for your tribe and its people.

So long as that white stone Gong is deployed and you have room for us, expect an Orcish immigrant every few moons.

In fact, one of my most loyal disciples has come along with me. They are quite insistent about joining your tribe. In truth, I lament them leaving my side, but cannot begrudge their wishes.

What say you? Will you accept this humble Orc into your township this day?

Your defeat of this sinister presence may be what tips events in our favor, and away from that of the treasonous shamans.

My deepest thanks to you, on behalf of my late Khan. I shall return to my people carrying the news that the Titanous scourge can, truly, be defeated.

intro.dialog_title: Erdene, Speaker of the Red Kiln
intro.choice_000: I'm glad we could do some good

bulletin_message.00:
Would you like to let this Orc to join your town?

[They're strong, slow, and surprisingly hard to startle and fast to regenerate despite their low Spirit]

msg1.dialog_title: An Orc wishes to join your town!

grant_recurring_orc_citizen.notification_title: A new Orc citizen has joined your town!

grant_orc_citizen.notification_title: Erdene's disciple has joined your town!

bulletin_message.00: For instance, a Hearth of Cheer is for those who believe that a town's value is found in being a happy home for its citizens.
A Hearth of Makers, on the other hand, is for those who believe that a town's value is its work, and that its work is best measured in gold.
Kind greetings! At last, I can see your Settlement in person. You've developed even faster than I anticipated, you should all be proud!

intro.choice_001: [skip] We know what Hearth we want.

bulletin_message.00: Finally, a Hearth of Glory is for those who believe their destiny is to stand strong in a hostile world, as the Knight Cid did at the founding of the Ascendancy.
Cheer, Glory, or Makers - the choice is entirely yours. Envision what your Town will one day be, and follow that beacon into the future!

I came out personally to help you on your last step towards being a true Settlement of the Ascendancy!

You've grown large enough now that it's time to choose what Hearth shall represent your town, as is tradition.

Indeed, Hearths have served as shining beacons for Towns all the way back to the Phoenix Empire.

Their glow attracts settlers and prosperity, and the particular qualities of a chosen Hearth reflect where a Town finds its value.

banner_upgrade_cunning.title: Outpost Established
banner_upgrade_cunning.reward_message: By unanimous agreement of the citizens, we declare:
banner_upgrade_cunning.reward_message_ctd: to be an outpost paving the roads to become a trade hub.

achievements.000: Roads give 3x their normal speed boost
achievements.002: Traders will bring 2x the goods and Gold

banner_upgrade_strength.title: Outpost Established
banner_upgrade_strength.reward_message: By unanimous agreement of the citizens, we declare:
banner_upgrade_strength.reward_message_ctd: to be an outpost on its way to be a safe haven for all.

achievements.001: Hearthlings no longer mind cramped spaces
achievements.000: Mining gives 50% more Ore, Stone, and Clay

banner_upgrade_vitality.title: Outpost Established
banner_upgrade_vitality.reward_message: By unanimous agreement of the citizens, we declare:
banner_upgrade_vitality.reward_message_ctd: to be an outpost striving to be at one with the environment.

achievements.001: Plants and Crops both grow 25% faster

hearth_upgrade_makers.title: Settlement Established
hearth_upgrade_makers.reward_message: By unanimous agreement of the citizens, we declare:
hearth_upgrade_makers.reward_message_ctd: to be a settlement out to prove that its riches and craftsmanship is unmatched.

achievements.001: Daily Update boosted by Gold Coins
achievements.000: +5% daily interest on Gold Coins (up to 300 per day)

hearth_upgrade_glory.title: Settlement Established
hearth_upgrade_glory.reward_message: By unanimous agreement of the citizens, we declare:
hearth_upgrade_glory.reward_message_ctd: To be a settlement out to prove that it has unrivaled military strength.

achievements.000: Hearth summons foes to defeat for Glory
achievements.001: Daily Update boosted by Glory Tier

hearth_upgrade_cheer.title: Settlement Established
hearth_upgrade_cheer.reward_message: By unanimous agreement of the citizens, we declare:
hearth_upgrade_cheer.reward_message_ctd: to be a settlement out to prove that it has the happiest, most well-fed citizens, and nice places for them to live.

achievements.000: Daily Update boosted by citizen Morale

bulletin_message.00: Kind greetings! My name is Ember Minton, and I am a missionary for the Church of Plenty. We would be delighted to have a settlement such as yours count among one of our Townships.

I'm Marak Azael, nice to meet you. It tickles my whiskers to see a settlement like yours, assembled from nothing in no time at all.

The very Ascendancy itself was built with saw and hammer by fine craftsfolk like yourselves! That's why the Guild means so much to me, and why I wanted to pay you a visit.

So! Now you've met the folks that tagged along with me - I'm impartial, here, so it's up to you to decide who you want as a Sponsor. I can say that they're all good choices, though!

I'm going to show them around town a little, but I'll leave the plans for each of their fountains and shrines and whatnot with your Masons.

Good to see you all again! I'll see you at the dedication ceremony for whichever you end up picking!

A Township dedicated to Cid's valorous example can serve as an anchor for a whole region, and embolden new settlers to forge their own new Outposts.

If you would choose to build a memorial to Cid, the Guard would be happy to share some of our knowledge of arms with you as part of the dedication ceremony.

Dedicating the Valor of Cid will grant you recipes for new, highest-tier weapons.

It is the Church's adage that 'Fortune favors the kind', and blessed fountains of Plenty are truly a blessing to the mind, body, and spirit of a Town's citizens.

Please consider showing the world that your Town will be one of kindness by building a shrine of the Church's design.

Dedicating a Fountain of Plenty will grant all of your townsfolk a +1 boost to the Mind, Body, and Spirit attributes.

Hello - I am Anwyn Torresi, Captain of Her Majesty's guard. She sends me with Her thanks for settling this untamed land, and for guarding it against animals and monsters alike.

We in the Guard follow the example of the Knight Cid, believing that standing brave and resolute against the wilderness is the only way for the Ascendancy to reclaim this lost land.

You have done the Ascendancy a great service by planting your Banner here.

The Crafters Guild! We believe that the skill of an artisan must be respected, and their works celebrated.

We at the Guild would love to sanction this Township as one fit to pursue mastery in crafts - and, after all, only we can truly know masterwork when we see it!

Dedicating a tribute to the Guildmaster's Skill will grant the ability to create Masterwork-quality furniture and decorations, which are considerably better than those of Excellent quality.

Hello again, [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! Glad to see you all still going strong - not that I expected any different!

In fact, I've brought some folks along with me this time - I'll let them introduce themselves and tell you why they've come.

As he should be! With fine crafters like them, your town will be churning out Masterworks in no time! I'll be keeping an eye out for a [str(i18n_data.town_name)] maker's mark in the Capital market in a few months!

Your homes all look pretty sturdy, too, come to think of it. My compliments to your Workers, they seem to know how to put things together, too!

Anyway, I'll let you get back to celebrating! I'm going to go hunt down a pint of something strong and a bowl of something hearty!

Remember, busy hands make a happy Town!

msg3.dialog_title: Marak claps you on the back

bulletin_message.00: Ha ha ha! What a fine monument you've built! Level, square, and all the finishing touches that only a trained eye such as mine could truly appreciate!</br></br><font size=-1>Huh, how'd you get it to glow like that, though?</font>

msg1.choice_000: Thank you! Our mason is quite proud.

bulletin_message.00:
Oh! I'm fine, I was just... remembering something.

You know, I really do believe in the Ascendancy, that we have a destiny to retake these lost lands. Every new Town that springs up serves to strengthen my belief.

But it's the Towns like yours, dedicated to the support our valorous Guard, that truly warm my heart.

I've brought along plans for the Guard's finest weapons, as you've surely earned the right to forge them.

Now, if my service has taught me anything, it's to eat a good meal when given the chance. I'll leave you to your celebrating!

What an inspiring monument! It truly speaks to the heroism of the Knight Cid.

It reminds me all over again why I became a member of the Guard. It feels like so long ago...

(Anwyn stares into the middle distance, eyes glistening.)

As this shrine bestows its blessing on you all, take a moment to reflect on the world, its mysteries, and its many bounties.

May your Town always be a happy home for its people, and a wellspring for the generosity of the Church of Plenty.
Now, enough somber platitudes - go enjoy the party! I think I saw Mer with some cake earlier that I'd love to get my hands on...

...and may this town flourish in fortune and prosperity, for so long as the Sun shall shine. Umbasa.

Oh! My apologies, I was lost in prayer.

You have a truly wonderful town here, and I feel so privileged to be the missionary to bless this fine monument.
Well, now, it seems my favorite little Outpost is all grown up! Congratulations on your newfound Township!

By the by, this monument here is special, since it's gotten blessed and all - you can build the others if you like, but they'll just be regular old statues. Fancy-looking ones, but none quite so magical.

Still, they make for a nice decoration, don't you think?

Thanks for being such a bunch of charming folks - I'm proud to serve a group of such earnest and ambitious individuals. You make me proud!

Farewell for now, and the best of luck to each of you!

msg3.choice_000: Farewell, Mer! It's been a pleasure!

bulletin_message.00:
Hello again! Now that you've got a bustling little town here, perhaps it's time to start thinking of your next adventure.

I expect some of your citizens are itching to head out and establish a brand new town, even bigger, and even better, with all the lessons learned from this one.

Re-embarking allows you to carry over up to 3 citizens, 10 items, and all your unlocked recipes when starting a new town.

Take the time to consider what you consider most important, what you wish that beacon to stand for. Prosperity? Happiness? Strength? Each is a noble pursuit.

Wishing you the best of luck!

Yours in the Capital,
Mer Burlyhands

P.S. A small gift for you from my personal garden ❀

Congratulations on your Founding!

Your Outpost has been entered into the registry - consider yourselves official! "Her Majesty's Outpost of [str(i18n_data.town_name)]" - it has a nice ring to it, I think. An inspirational Banner design, as well!

All of us here are eager to hear of your success!

As your Outpost grows towards Settlement status, you will start to attract new immigrants.

Your Hearth now is only a spark of what it will one day become - I have faith that it will be a beacon seen all across the Ascendancy.

The messenger bird returns, with a reply from Mer Burlyhands.

The letter has bite marks, and is slightly drooled on. Harold is doing his best.

Which Shrine will you build to signify your Settlement's ascent into Township?

Shrine of Fortune (+1 Mind, Body, and Spirit for your citizens!)

Shrine of Valor (Legendary weapons)

Shrine of Masterwork (Unlocks Masterwork-tier crafts! Four times as Appealing and Expensive as Excellent-tier!)

guildmaster.name: The Guildmaster's Skill
guildmaster.description:
This Township shall be known for its artisans' hard work and dedication to their craft.
  • Allows crafting Masterwork quality items
  • Unlocks artisan-themed decoration recipes

deity.name: Fountain of Plenty
deity.description:
This Township shall show generosity and kindness to the needy.
  • Blesses all citizens with +1 to Mind, Body, and Spirit
  • Unlocks nature-themed decoration recipes

valor.name: The Valor of Cid
valor.description:
This Township shall be dedicated to Cid's valorous example to protect the whole region.
  • Unlocks legendary weapon recipes
  • Unlocks castle decoration recipes

bulletin_message.00:
Next time I visit, I'll bring these folks along with me, and let them plead their cases. Decisions, decisions!

Until then!

Yours in the Capital,
 Mer Burlyhands

Dear [str(i18n_data.town_name)]-ites,

Word around the Capital is that your Settlement has grown since I last saw it, and that it's getting even more bustling by the day! Your Hearth must be burning brightly to attract so many new settlers.

In fact, it's also attracted the attention of a few notable individuals.

As you probably know, a settlement traditionally needs a Sponsorship to become a true Township - generally from a guild, the clergy, or the military.

In the past few days, I've been approached by a few individuals who are very interested to get a look at your town for themselves, and see if you'd be interested in allowing them to be your Sponsor.
Looks like Mer is getting in touch with us again!

Hold in your mind a vision of what your Town will one day be. Your Banner will set that course, but it is up to you to finish it.

Choose well, my friends. I eagerly await your reply.


Yours,

 Mer Burlyhands

An odd bird arrives with a letter in its beak, stamped with the Official Seal of the Ascendancy.

The bird also carries a nametag, which reads 'Harold'

open_letter.choice_001: [skip] We know what banner we want.

bulletin_message.00:
Dear Expedition [str(i18n_data.town_serial_number)],

I hope this letter finds you well. By my guess, you've likely set up camp by now.

As your Capital Liaison, it is my honor to preside, remotely, over the official Founding of your Outpost! I trust that you had ample time to choose a name on your journey.

As you know, every new settlement must choose a Banner.

This Banner reflects your spirit and vision, the uniting factor which brought the Expedition together!

What future did you foresee when you embarked on your quest for Township?
The odd messenger bird scurries off with your Official Settlement Founding Declaration in its beak, carrying it in the vague direction of the capital.

You're not sure how you missed it before, but the bird is wearing a tiny backpack.

It contains a note, which reads "A little something to help you celebrate" along with:

glory.name: Hearth of Glory
glory.description:
Proof that you have military strength, and that you're prepared to keep it on its feet.
  • Allows summoning increasingly difficult enemies to prove your mettle
  • Each rank defeated will boost Daily Update net worth

makers.name: Hearth of the Makers
makers.description:
Proof that gold has been flowing through your settlement, and that you have fine crafters.
  • Generates 5% daily interest on any Gold Coins you have on hand (up to 300 per day)
  • Boosts your Daily Update net worth based on Gold Coins on hand

cheer.name: Hearth of Cheer
cheer.description:
Proof that you have happy, well-fed citizens, and nice places for them to live.
  • Boosts Daily Update net worth based on the overall Morale of your citizens
  • Each day brings a new random buff for your townsfolk.

titan_defeated_town_bonus.description: With the defeat of its lurking Titan, this town's citizens can't help but be more cheerful.

bulletin_message.00: This calls for a celebration!

With a terrifying roar and a staggering blast of energy, the apparition of the Titan disintegrates, vanishing into nothingness.

As the gloom fades, your citizens marvel at the clear sky stretching out above them, and the land itself seems to breathe a sigh of relief as the laws of nature return to normal.

bulletin_message.00:
"Hello again, my friends of the Monkey! I hope this day finds you at peace.

Honorable Humans, I... have a confession to make."

"When I originally came to you, it was in hopes that you could be... useful to us." he says sheepishly, with drooped ears. "The Titan lurking beneath your town has loomed over my people for generations. I saw in your town a spark of hope that we might be free of its burden.

I apologize for not being more open about my motives before now. I hope I can be forgiven."

"I must admit, your town surpassed my wildest dreams, managing to defeat a foe of such magnitude by your own strength alone.

But not only that - my people and I have grown fond of you beyond expectation, as well" he admits, smiling. "You have been faithful allies to us, and we have learned much from each other. I hope our two warrens can continue our budding friendship."

Sasha looks visibly relieved. "I am glad to hear it! I will take my leave of you for now, but I shall visit again! Once more, congratulations on cleansing your land of the Titan scourge, it is not something easily done. Farewell!"

[Select the Arbalest and Press the 'Awaken Titan' button when you're ready. Once the Arbalest has charged, hit the Fire button to damage the Titan. Killing or destroying the Titan's minions, tentacles, and roots will also reduce its health.]

[Good luck!]

"The Arbalest looks to be in working shape. Isn't it beautiful? The way it sparkles?"

He shakes his head to clear his mind. "Now is no time for distraction. Now that it's standing, all that's left is to activate it and call forth the Titan. Once that's happened, it's up to us to make sure it's charging, but I'll call on you to actually fire. It's your town, so it only seems right"

"Only summon the Titan when you're ready for a siege. It will not be easy, and he will not be kind."
<TKTK Congrats>

"In fact, now that the evil has passed, there should be enough Hearth magic energy up here in the aboveground to support Lapines. So long as you keep that monument standing, you should expect some of us to ask to immigrate here, from time to time."

"Fantastic, I'll let them know post-haste!"

"Now, I... suppose that's all. Enjoy your celebrations!"
"By the stars! By the Divines! You did it! We did it! Did you see the look on his face as he imploded? Kapowww!" Sasha says, with excitement you've never seen from him before.

greet.bulletin_title: Sasha leaps into the air, joyous!

bulletin_message.00:
"Oh, I see - it's not my place to decide, so I'll respect your wishes."

"Now, I suppose that's all the business - let's enjoy the celebrations!"

"Also... the Geomancer who worked most closely on the Arbalest, who made it happen at all, has expressed to me a desire to stay here beside it, among the people who defended it. I think they've earned their place here, but that's not for me to decide."

"What do you say, would you like this Rabbit Geomancer to join your town?"
<TKTK Request 3>

Sasha stops, holding his knees and panting slightly. "Whew... oh... look, over at the Arbalest! It seems... its job is done, and now it's gone dormant. Let's have it serve as a monument, a memorial, to what the friendship of our two clans could achieve!"

intro.choice_000: I'm glad we could do some good

bulletin_message.00:
"My dear human friends! It has been generations since we Lapine have found an ally as trustworthy as you. We have decided to offer you a precious gift."

"We would like to bring one of your own into our warren for a time, to teach them the art of Geomancy."

"Do you understand how vital Geomancy is to us, of the history of my kind and of Clan Amberstone?"

Sasha nods sagely. "This world of Hearth is ruled by the Heavenly Cycles. Each eon brings a different entity to Ascendance, who raises their own kind to an evolved state."

"Monkey is in Ascendance now, giving you Humans form and cleverness. Snake was before, and has waned, its Orcs slowly reverting to their lizard nature. Rabbit before that; long ago, but you can find our statues dotting the landscape even now."

"Now then, to business - would you like to send one of your esteemed citizens with me to learn the ways of Geomancy? I estimate it will take at least a week to grant them a basic understanding."

"This may be your only chance to do so - I feel the elders may change their minds again in a hare's breath."
"I see. Are you sure? As I said, this may likely be your only chance to gain such knowledge."

Sasha continues. "Rabbit left Ascendance, and Snake uplifted the Orcs. The Orcs were unsatisfied sharing the world indefinitely, and rejected our attempts to teach them Geomancy, saying it was against the will of the Cycle and that Hearth’s magic was forbidden; dangerous and volatile."

"In truth, they were not wrong."

"Very well, I suppose things of the Rabbit stay of the Rabbit after all."

"I shall take my leave for now. I still count you as dear friends and allies, so I will be back in touch before long! Farewell!"

"During our Cycle, we Lapine studied its magic deeply. We began to understand the nature of the magical Divine Harmonics produced from the Cycle and which grant our uplifted form. We also learned that Hearth exudes magic, the manipulation of which became known as Geomancy".

"We learned to harness this Hearth magic, our Geomancers attuning it through amberstones such that it keeps us from devolving back to the simple fuzzy creatures you see hopping around the surface now."

story2.choice_000: But it didn't work on everyone?

bulletin_message.00:
"Still, our largest cities were using up magic energy faster than Hearth could produce it, forcing us to scatter. At the same time, radical factions of Orc were hostile to us, forcing us to consolidate. We were at an impasse."

"So, my ancestors made the drastic choice to go underground, taking the name Amberstone and building tunnels and settlements along Leylines mapped by Lapine Geomancers. These seams of intense magic energy let them survive underground indefinitely."

"Splendid! Take all the time you need in choosing, the selection is important indeed."

"As I said, they will be gone for around seven days, so don't send anyone you can't bear to be without."
"You... are not wrong, friend. There is more to the story, but perhaps the time is not yet right."

"Your wayfaring student of Geomancy has returned as a full-fledged Geomancer! They proved themselves an able practitioner of the magic arts indeed!"

"Here - these precious Hearthbloom flowers coalesce traces of Hearth's magic into Hearth Essence, which Geomancers can use in their craft - be sure to plant them."

simple_message.choice_000: Welcome back, and thank you all!

For the present, I must return home, but I shall return in the coming days. Farewell, humans.

[Rabbit reputation increased]

bulletin_message.00: "Of course the green part! We'd never eat the disgusting red fruit part, it's all... squishy. Keep those and do with them what you wish," says Sasha, disgusted.
"I hope the Heirbloom is growing nicely. Let us know when some of their delicious, green stalks are ready for me to take back to my people!"

"Thank you! My respect for you humans continues to grow. Farewell for now!"

He wanders off, mumbling to himself, "Mmm... I can't imagine my warren will be upset if one or two are missing from the bundle..."

[Rabbit reputation increased]
"Fantastic! I'll show them how to plant it, at least, as far as I've been told. I shall return eagerly once it's had a chance to grow!"

"Greetings! I come asking a favor a long time in the making. There is a plant, known to my people as 'Heirbloom', which has not been grown for a long time. It needs the sun to flourish, and we've been unable to stay aboveground long enough to tend it for many years."

"These seeds have been passed down in my warren for generations, and I would be grateful, and honored, if you could grow them for us."

msg1.choice_000: Exciting! Our farmers would be happy to.

bulletin_message.000: "Awww... alright, I might come back later." They wander off, clearly pouting.
bulletin_message.001: "I see, sorry to bother you. Maybe send word if more sprouts up?"

bulletin_message.001: A Rabbit finds her way into town, on the lookout for anything nasty. "Dear humans, could I perhaps trade you for some Heirbloom? It's ever so tasty, and Sasha told us we should come get to know you better..."

bulletin_message.00:
"Ahh, the full brilliance of an Amberstone is a sight to behold! Thank you for your kind service, take these in thanks."

[Rabbit reputation increased]
"I understand. Perhaps next time. Farewell, humans."

"Charging them is simple - just place them anywhere in sunlight or moonlight, and they will gather energy on their own."

"The... only issue is that creatures tend to be attracted to the Amberstones at night. So, either prepare to defend against them, or be sure to take the crystals down before nightfall."
"Splendid, I'll lay the Charging Stones by your banner. I'll return for them once they've been deployed and gathering light for long enough - sunlight or moonlight, it all comes from the same place."

"Greetings, kind humans. As you know, we live undergound, and because of that we rely on Amberstone, our namesake material, for many things."

"Amberstones can absorb many kinds of energy, sunlight being one of them - and these stones here have lost their glow."

"In Rabbit culture, when a new warren is dug, it exchanges statues with its neighbors to symbolize a mutual welcoming. We know you are unaware of this, but have come to offer this for our part"

Sasha gestures to the beautifully chiseled statue of smooth, cool stone ornamented with intricate weavings and a golden core of what must be Amberstone.

"This partnership somewhat unprecedented, but we think that you may represent hope for us against the coming darkness."

"You shall see us again soon! Oh, and feel free to keep the cricket golem, it would slow me down on the return trip. Farewell!"

Sasha Lightfoot approaches, a small load-bearing stone insect bobbling along behind him. "Friends! Not long ago, my kind were afraid of you kin of Monkey, but you have dissolved our purposeless trepidation! We have found in you a dependable ally in the aboveground!"

msg1.choice_002: It's been nice knowing you as well

bulletin_message.00:
"I will leave this Amberstone Pedestal. Build or choose a nice home with two beds, and place this pedestal there. Once all is prepared, I will return with my kin!

Place the Amberstone Pedestal near two beds, with a high enough appeal - check the name of the placed item for live updates!
Sasha nods. "Very well. They will no doubt be disappointed, but it will bring me some comfort to have them settle closer to the safety of the warren."

"Splendid! Some accomodations must first be made. You see, the Amberstone crystals are more than a mere light source - they are also what keeps us from reverting to the simple animals you see hopping around the surface."

"Never fear, such a process takes considerable time. All the same, a Rabbit home would not be comfortable without an Amberstone at its center."
"So, a pair of my more adventurous kin are interested in immigrating to the aboveground. In fact, they specifically asked me to ask you if you might have a place for them here."

msg1.choice_000: Yes, we would love to have them!
msg1.choice_001: No - but we wish them the best!

bulletin_message.00: "What a nice home you've built for them! They will be here shortly, and I'm sure they'll be charmed!"

"It's working! The weapon is charging!!"

"Hold off whatever foul tricks the Titan has in store for us, and I'll let you know when it's ready to fire!"
"It's charged again! Fire at will!"
"It's charged!!! Fire at will!" Sasha shouts at you, covering his sensitive ears.

Sasha leaps into the air in excitement. "Direct hit!!! Take that, you big ugly squid!"

Calming down a little, he turns to you. "It will take time to recharge - I'll let you know when it's ready again. Keep up the defense, we must stay standing."

Sasha's features soften and his shoulders relax, an enormous weight clearly lifted from him. He speaks, ears folded subtly back and eyes glistening:

"Listen, I... thank you. Thank you. I have spent so much time worrying about my people's future, and you... you are proof that we can have one. That we can have a good one. We are forever in your debt."

"Thank you, and may your future be even brighter than ours."

conclusion_accept.choice_000: We merely repaid our peoples' debt to yours.
conclusion_accept.choice_001: We are honored to have helped.

request2.choice_001: No, but they have our thanks

bulletin_message.00:
Sasha nods his head. "While Human cleverness brought the entity, human cleverness also forestalled its cataclysm. As the entity tore open the leyline, the surviving humans knew they had to act, as the great evil was bathed in magic and growing in strength by the second."

"Hearth's magic is volatile. The humans, desperate, somehow catalyzed a reaction which turned the magic energy into pure magic force."

"The entity was shattered into countless fragments, not killed but, rather, transformed into a miasma of aimless evil that swept over the land, emanating from the ravaged crater that was once the seat of the Phoenix Empire."

"This is what we know as 'the cataclysm'."

"So - an eon passed; Snake declined, Monkey Ascended. Some say Monkey is a newcomer, and snatched Ascendancy from Snake early, but that’s another story. Either way, Humans built with startling speed, and the Phoenix Empire spanned the continent within three generations."

"Unsatisfied with mere subsistence underground, my ancestors contacted the Phoenix, who proved amenable to us."

"In fact, our teachings of Geomancy fascinated them. As is their nature, the Phoenix researchers made fast progress in utilizing Hearth’s magic, without truly understanding it. They put it to use without any concern for consequences."

Sasha nods, sighing. "I understand; each warren has challenges of its own to face. Still, we will find a way to complete work on the Titan weapon on our own, and return with it once it is ready."

"May our friendship continue to blossom," he says, bowing slightly and taking his leave.

"Recall what I told you before, of my people's rise when Rabbit was in Ascendance, of the discovery of Geomancy and amberstone that allows us to keep this upright form even once Snake Ascended and Rabbit waned."

"I told you, too, of how my clan took to living underground, driven by both hostility and a lack of magic on Hearth's surface. That's where I left off, correct?"

"The Phoenix capital was built on the ruins of an ancient Lapine city, which was in turn built on a nexus of Leylines. This meant it was an enormously powerful wellspring of magic."

"Human Geomancy researchers built devices to extract this magic; to store it and focus it beyond anything we had ever imagined possible, and well beyond the bounds of safety or sanity. And then, a portal was opened."

"Nobody knows if it was intentional, or if the strain of all that channeled magic simply tore a hole in reality. What we do know is that an entity was drawn through it, ravenous for magical energy and abhorrent of all other life."

"So now, to the favor. There is, beneath this land, a nascent Titan. This fragment of the great evil grows, seeping farther underground more each year, forcing my people farther and farther underground to not be cut off from the magic of Hearth and be doomed to have our descendants revert to mere rabbits."

"But: we have found an answer. We have nearly completed construction of a weapon drawn from ancient designs, capable of manifesting the Titan, and capable of destroying it for good."

"However, we require your help in finishing it, and… we require your town to protect it. We lack the strength or the numbers to withstand the wrath of a manifested Titan for long, and this weapon will take time to do its job. Will you help us?"

favor1.choice_000: What do you need from us?

bulletin_message.00:
Sasha's eyes sparkle, full of relief and gratitude. "I was right to have put my trust in you. Please, prepare your citizens to visit with us for a time, and I will return with the finished device in time."

"Perhaps use this time to store some food, shore up your defenses, and train your military. Perhaps enlist some citizens in a town guard, or build a fortified structure? One cannot be sure in what form the Titan's ire will manifest."

"Dear friends of the Monkey, I bring greetings and well wishes from the twenty-third warren of Amberstone."

"I have a… momentous favor to ask of you, but I think perhaps you lack the context to understand it. Am I right that the history of the Phoenix Empire became lost to you humans after the cataclysm?"

"Humans, sensible, fled; to the coasts, to the northern mountains. Only recently have you started to build inwards again. Orcs, stubborn, stayed and fought the corruptions, fought the apparitions of a natural world brought to anger, defending the lands abandoned by the humans. And we Lapine, already underground, were content to wait."

"But as the evil energies settled, they embedded in the ground, drawn downwards towards the source of Hearth’s magic. These fragments absorb that magic, slowly gaining strength over generations, congealing into malevolent aspects which your people have come to call ‘Titans’."

Sasha nods, exhaling deeply. "I understand. 'If a favor is not asked lightly, neither is it accepted lightly'. Our current warren will continue to serve for years yet before the darkness encroaches.

"We will complete work on the Titan weapon on our own, and then return. Hopefully you will have a change of heart. May our friendship continue to blossom," he says, with both sadness and sincerity, and takes his leave.

"First, I will need to borrow some of your citizens: One experienced Mason to double-check our work, an experienced Blacksmith to help with reinforcement, plus two other citizens of your choosing to... help reach the tall parts."

"With that complete, we will return with the weapon, and once you have prepared, we will use it to summon, attack, and destroy the Titan. The attack may take some significant time, so you should prepare for a siege."

"I should say... this evil is of no immediate threat to you. This is a task to benefit your people's children, and mine."

Sasha returns, along with a massive, sparkling bow teetering precariously atop a skittering golem.

"I know you previously declined to assist us with fighting the Titan," he says, "but we completed this Arbalest despite your refusal. It took sacrifice, but we knew not what else to do."

"It serves no use within our warren, so we have brought it here as a reminder of our request. If you decide to face the slumbering evil, merely deploy the Crystalline Arbalest and I will instruct you further.

Sasha returns, along with a massive, sparkling bow teetering precariously atop a skittering golem.

"It took sacrifice, but we have completed the Crystalline Arbalest to the specifications of my ancestors. I... hope it works."

"If you are still open to fighting this monstrosity, signal your readiness by deploying the Arbalest, and I'll instruct you in its usage."

Sasha returns, followed by your dispatched citizens and a massive, sparkling bow balanced atop a skittering golem.

"I have returned, not only with your citizens, but with a completed Crystalline Arbalest, built to the specifications of my ancestors. I... hope it works."

"Signal your readiness by deploying it, and I'll instruct you in its usage."
The Rabbit Geomancer brought some Hearthbloom, Hearth Essence, and raw materials along with them, to help start their new aboveground practice.

bulletin_message.00: "Splendid! I think even a novice Mason and Weaver would work just fine, so long as they're receptive to teaching. It shouldn't take more than two days."
"Hum. Well, I suppose maybe I still have much to learn about human aesthetics after all..."

"Kind greetings, human friends! I was struck by an idea after watching your crafters at work - how would you like to send a Mason and a Weaver down to our warren for a few days, to learn our various crafting recipes and techniques?"

"Oh. I thought it was a clever idea, myself."

"Are you certain? I'll not offer again, you see."

bulletin_message.000: Upon reaching a point near the banner, the three masked individuals stop.  Everything about them is strange.  Their faces are completely covered by their masks, their heads covered in hoods, their hands covered in gloves, their feet [so small!] are sheathed in the tiniest of boots.  The material of their garments seems to be of some otherworldly origin, shining in the sun and blowing in the breeze.  And - most notably - they each have a beautiful golden necklace set with a massive sapphire.

msg2.bulletin_title: The figures stop at the banner
msg2.dialog_title: The figures stop at the banner

bulletin_message.000: The masked figures look about them, inspecting buildings and garments.  They seem as interested in our clothing as we are of theirs.  The smallest one reaches out as though to touch one of our boots, but the tallest one makes a quick hissing noise which forces the little one to straighten back up.

Emma reaches under her robes and withdraws a beautiful golden scepter with a magical fire as it’s ornament:

'Of Hestia, the Light. As gift, we bring. Nothing in return, we request... Understanding perhaps, friendship one day?'

msg8.choice_000: Thank you for this wondrous gift!

bulletin_message.000:
Dylan places an arm onto Lily’s shoulder to calm and silence her, then addresses the crowd himself:

'In need, many. Of Hestia, heirs travel. Masks, we don, in self-abnegation. The darkness to push, the Light we bring. Through sacrifice and oblation, our worth to lead we prove. To those without power, a hand of support we offer.'

The smallest figure raises their hands above their head and then bows deeply. As they move, their mysterious cloth flows and trails behind in motion. Their voice sounds more similar to squeaking gears than that of a voice we are used to, and is slightly muffled from behind the mask:

'Lily. Of Hestia, Princess, Painter [giggle], Healer, Archer.'

greet_lily.choice_000: A pleasure to meet you Princess Lily.

bulletin_message.000:
The middle sized figure then raises their hands similarly and bows. This figure’s movements are more quick and snappy, and the cloth appears to be trying to catch up to the limbs movement before it. There is a sense of wild strength behind these movements, and again the voice is not as expected - this time even more shrill and cracking occasionally:

'Dylan. Of Hestia, Prince, Poet, Smith, Warrior.'
After forceful motions and the brandishing of weapons, the three masked peoples turn and move off in another direction.
They seem peaceful, greeting anyone who comes close with a strange but simple motion: spreading their hands open wide in a circle, then clasping them together as they bow their heads.

msg1.bulletin_title: A group of three masked people calmly make their way towards the banner

bulletin_message.000:
The tallest figure takes a step forward and begins to speak. They make a large flourish of greetings with their arms, seeming to encompass all those hearthlings who are nearby, and then speaks - their voice soft and a few octaves higher than their size suggested.

'Disciples of Monkey, Greetings! Of Hestia we travel. From royalty our lineage. We introduce, please.'

msg4.bulletin_title: The tallest figure begins to speak
msg4.dialog_title: The tallest figure begins to speak

bulletin_message.000:
While Emma speaks, she takes a moment to look into the eyes of each person gathered around her:

'For our great journey, we trek under the stars. Of great abundance, darkness and pain we find. Found as before, royals of Hestia declared. In need, many...'

Lily quickly steps forward, unable to contain the emotion bubbling out from behind her mask:

'Many! Bruised and beaten, many your kind! As well Goblin, Orc! Bandage and salve, many wounds! Of great pain also, Turtle Lizard - so cute! [giggle] To keep Lily wanted, Dylan denied. Before release, nursed to good health. Waddled away, SO cute! To heal Lily finds...'

msg6.choice_001: You’re quite a spit-fire aren’t you?

bulletin_message.000: Ah, as well Emma remembers. In need, many still. The darkness to push... the Light will you take?

The tallest figure repeats the gesture, bowing impossibly low. Though largest, this figure moves with the most grace. The cloth rippling smoothly behind their limbs as though it were flowing through water:

'Emma. Of Hestia, Princess, Eldest Heir, Diplomat, Weaver, Lancer.'

greet_emma.choice_001: All of you are welcome to our town.

bulletin_message.000: Having completed their task the three then walk off into the wilderness, presumably to find the next community in need.  What an interesting people...

msg1.choice_000: Hopefully they remain safe in their travels.

bulletin_message.000:
Lily begins bouncing in excitement:

'Yes, oh! Bruised and beaten are your people?! Help I can, to heal Lily finds great joy!'

With a large flowing gesture of approval from Emma, Lily rushes around the village to tend to any wounds she finds - large or small alike.

Emma places the scepter on the ground and slowly backs away, her garments flowing behind her. After a moment she looks around at the different faces of the crowd:

'Of great curiosity, we are. Stay for a while, to converse and learn, may we?'

msg1.choice_000: Stay as long as you like!
msg1.choice_001: One of you said you’re a healer?

bulletin_message.000:
With one final flourish, Emma turns to face away from the town, Dylan and Lily do the same. With her back turned, Lily speaks:

'Our journey, continue we must [giggle]. To more in need, the light we bring.'

I am a spirit, from a time and people long past. I have lingered here for countless ages, guarding that which was most precious to us. But my power has waned, and now it has come under siege - please, lend me your assistance!

information.bulletin_title: The voice coalesces into a figure

bulletin_message.000: Please, help me!  My castle has come under siege by undead minions of evil!

msg1.bulletin_title: A voice whispers at the edges of your mind

bulletin_message.000: There's no time! The undead claw at my gates, and I have no strength left to defend the trove once they make it through! I beg of you, help!

theres_no_time_to_explain.bulletin_title: The dragonborn king presence is overbearing

bulletin_message.000: It has been many cycles.. too many. My family line lives no longer, and my body failed me long ago. My soul has been of the dragon's watch long enough to see many races born and die.  Yours has been of great interest, Children of Monkey, as my vigil comes to an end.

information_howlong.bulletin_title: The dragonborn king sighs and sags visibly

bulletin_message.000: Thank you for coming to my rescue. I have long guarded this site, but I can no longer raise my sword or shield in its defense.

msg1.choice_002: How long have you been here?

bulletin_message.000: My name is Flox, of the Icedragon lineage. I was King, once, of the Dragonborn peoples, who ruled this land in an age long past.

information_who.choice_001: How long have you been here?

bulletin_message.000: I am fading fast, but I have given the last of my spirit to this egg of the Great Dragon, so that the dragonling inside may finally hatch out into this world. I have known you for little time, Children of Monkey, but I trust you will aid this young welp as you have aided me. May you carry yourselves with strength and compassion, as the Dragonborn once did.

hatch_and_attach.bulletin_title: The Dragonborn King breathes softly into the egg in front of him
hatch_and_attach.choice_000: We will honor you, King. May you be at peace.

bulletin_message.000: It is a King's duty to protect the Great Dragon's lineage - a duty that endures even through death.  My spirit has kept this place hidden, veiled from sense and sight, for as long as it could.  I see now that I can maintain my vigil no longer, and that the Dragon's lineage is at risk.

information_what.bulletin_title: The dragonborn king straightens his back in pride
information_what.choice_000: How can we help with the lineage thing?
information_what.choice_002: How long have you been here?

bulletin_message.000: I can stand no longer. The trove has fallen, and with it the last light of my people. I was a fool to stay silent so long...

msg1.bulletin_title: The voice returns, seemingly with great effort
