cook_description.description: The Cook makes delicious, hearty meals from base vegetables and meats.

workshop.name: Stone Cauldron
workshop.long_description: Humongous, heavy pot, suitable for cooking up a feast at a time!

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Cook has learned to make slightly fancier recipes.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Cook can make basic, nutritious recipes.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The cook can now make more big, satisfying meat dishes, along with a crusty, savory pot pie.
level_3_data.perk_001_description:
When inspiration strikes, the Cook may now prepare an especially Fine quality of meal.

(Fine meals give an extra happy thought, are scarfed down more quickly, and sell for more!)

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Cook can now make and work with Sugar.

level_5_data.perk_000_description:
The Cook can now prepare meals of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality meals more often.

(Excellent meals are eaten even more quickly, give another happy thought, and sell for even more!!)

cook_spoon_iconic.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Cook.

cook_spoon_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Cook.

cook_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Cook for delicious recipes.

flour_recipe.description: A necessary ingredient for all kinds of bread.

meat_stew_recipe.description: Hearty, satisfying, and perfect to ease the passing of a cold night.
meat_stew_recipe.flavor: Before you ask, it's an assortment of meats.

veggie_stew_recipe.description: A warm, savory broth, fortified with braised pumpkin!
veggie_stew_recipe.flavor: Afterwards, you feel satisfied, but not heavy.

poyo_pot_pie_recipe.description: A tasty meat and veggie pie.

omelette_recipe.description: Veggies and meat wrapped in egg.

fried_eggs_recipe.flavor: Do you like yours sunnyside up?

sheep_feed_recipe.description: A supplement for a healthy sheep diet

cook_workbench_recipe.description: Use to cook nutritions soups and stews.
cook_workbench_recipe.flavor: Stone, to keep the food hot for a long time.

corn_meal_recipe.description: Corn ground into a fine powder

roast_mutton_recipe.flavor: The traditional meal, excellent with berry sauce!

donation_box_recipe.recipe_name: Donation to the Church of Plenty
donation_box_recipe.description: Care-package for those in greater need than you
donation_box_recipe.flavor: To the hungry, bread, to the driven, faith. --Cid the Wanderer

kibble_recipe.flavor: There is a hole in my heart the shape of a kitten.

bacon_and_eggs_recipe.description: Pork and eggs just like you like 'em.
bacon_and_eggs_recipe.flavor: The grease just gets into the eggs and tastes so good!

fried_eggs_large_recipe.description: One HUGE egg fried to order.

bug_meat_stew_recipe.description: Stringy, spicy, and perfect to eat on a hot day.
bug_meat_stew_recipe.flavor: Just don't ask, you know it's made of bugs.

roast_varanus_recipe.flavor: What a tasty slice of lizard tail!

roast_poultry_large_recipe.flavor: Those legs are good for running.. and eating!

roast_venison_recipe.flavor: Not a common meal, but tasty when you can find it.

sugar_recipe.description: A necessary ingredient for all kinds of sweets.

cake_recipe.description: A tasty Cake made from wheat and sugar.
cake_recipe.flavor: So delicious with a berry on top!

bug_meat_kabob_recipe.description: Bug meat on a stick! Has an interesting texture

roasted_sweet_potato_recipe.flavor: Warms your hands and your heart.

sausage_recipe.description: Shred up the meat, mix in some spice, stick it in a wrap, and it's good to go!
sausage_recipe.flavor: It's a good way to stretch out your food reserves a bit.

roast_sausage_recipe.description: Tantalisingly roasted to perfection, made from any kind of meat!
roast_sausage_recipe.flavor: It's some kind of meat, not sure which it was though...

feed_fodder_recipe.flavor: What a great use of excess seeds!

pie_berry_recipe.description: A scrumptious pie that is very complicated to make.
pie_berry_recipe.flavor: The crust and the berries go so well together.

pie_pear_recipe.description: A scrumptious pie that is very complicated to make.
pie_pear_recipe.flavor: It's called 'Prickly Pear' but all the prickles have been removed.

cake_layered_recipe.description: An extremely involved recipe but so good, and so filling...
cake_layered_recipe.flavor: It's so beautiful!  And just covered in tasties!

dumpling_meat_recipe.description: A little bread pocket with meat and spices stuffed inside.
dumpling_meat_recipe.flavor: A little complicated to make, but fill you up pretty well.

dumpling_vegetarian_recipe.description: A little bread pocket with veggies and spices stuffed inside.
dumpling_vegetarian_recipe.flavor: A little complicated to make, but fill you up pretty well.

cook_mill_ghost.description: Used by the cook to grind grains into flour.

engineer_description.description: The Engineer creates advanced contraptions and defensive weaponry.

level_6_data.title: Master Engineer
level_6_data.perk_000_description: This Engineer can place up to twelve traps and eight turrets

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Engineer can repair broken doors and gates more efficiently

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Engineer can now make basic gadgets and decorations.
level_1_data.perk_001_description: This Engineer can place up to four traps and two turrets
level_1_data.perk_002_description: The Engineer can repair broken doors, gates and other fixable structures.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: This Engineer can place up to eight traps and four turrets.
level_3_data.perk_001_description: When inspiration strikes, the Engineer may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Engineer can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

engineer_wrench_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Engineer

engineer_wrench.description: Tools of the trade for an Engineer

engineer_workbench_ghost.description: Used by engineers to create gadgets

engineer_workbench_recipe.description: Allows engineers to craft various gadgets and contraptions

bronze_gear_recipe.flavor: Luckily have teeth that don't requiring brushing

small_turret_recipe.description: After placed, shoots at enemies from a distance. Must be repaired after 20 uses.

iron_gear_recipe.flavor: Not for use as a throwing star

clamp_trap_recipe.description: Damages and shortly stuns enemies that step near it

turnip_shooter_recipe.description: Shoots turnips at enemies from a small distance. Must be repaired after 15 uses.
turnip_shooter_recipe.flavor: Don't like the taste of turnips? Don't worry, they're multi-functional.

critter_trap_recipe.description: Deals a small amount of damage and shortly stuns enemies.
critter_trap_recipe.flavor: A slight annoyance for ogres. A death wish for mice.

iron_door_recipe.description: Thick, sturdy iron door. Also comes with a thick, sturdy lock.

wooden_sign_engineer_recipe.description: A sign with the mark of the Engineer.

mechanism_recipe.description: The wheels of the Empire Bow
mechanism_recipe.flavor: A clever rotational mechanism that adds speed, power, and precision

diligence_2_buff.description: The engineer can repair doors more efficiently

farmer_description.description: Farmers till fields and harvest crops, providing a consistent food supply and raw materials for baked goods.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The farmer can perform amazing acts of arboreal advancement! (They can grow trees.)

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Running fresh food from field to table has increased the farmer's footspeed.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Exposure to fresh food has given the farmer ideas about cooked food. See the promotion menu for details.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The farmer coaxes greater yield from each plant.

speed_1_buff.description: Running fresh food from field to table has increased the farmer's footspeed.

farmer_hoe_iconic.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Farmer.

farmer_hoe_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Farmer.

footman_description.description: The Footman is a melee fighter. A good choice for the backbone of your town's defense.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The footman is now practiced at optimizing the effect of each blow.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The footman knows that all combats may have mortal consequences, and attacks with renewed determination.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: This powerful, overhead swing deals double damage.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The footman charges into battle with speed

level_5_data.perk_000_description: A slashing strike that deals damage to up to 4 enemies around the footman's target

damage_1_buff.description: At Level 1, the footman attacks with increased ferocity

damage_2_buff.description: The footman attacks with increased ferocity

damage_3_buff.description: At Level 6, the footman's attacks are unstoppable!

footman_outfit.description: Standard issue gear for all soldiers

geomancer_description.requirements: A talisman from Clan Amberstone and trust in Hearth.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Geomancer can now craft stones that manipulate water and summon large terrain layers.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The Geomancer can now craft all golems, and keep up to 10 of them active simulataneously.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Geomancer can now craft stones that summon terrain chunks and basic features.

level_4_data.perk_001_description: The Geomancer can now craft stones that summon landmarks.
level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Geomancer can now craft stones that summon ore veins.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Geomancer can now craft advanced golems, and keep up to 6 of them active simulataneously.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The Geomancer can now craft basic golems, and keep up to 3 of them active simulataneously.

geomancer_outfit.description: The gem-studded robes of a geomancer.

geomancer_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Geomancer to craft summoning stones.

geomancer_starter_kit.description: Loot for items needed to start up a geomancer

geomancer_talisman_iconic.description: Intensifies the bearer's ability to interact with the powers of Hearth.

geomancer_talisman.description: Intensifies the bearer's ability to interact with the powers of Hearth.

geomancer_golem_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Geomancer to craft golems.

golem_restocking_recipe.flavor: As they go about their tasks, you can hear their cute little calls.

golem_mining_recipe.flavor: No mountain can withstand the Mole's pick.

golem_harvesting_recipe.flavor: Gentle enough to pick a flower without disturbing the ground.

geomancer_workbench_recipe.flavor: A workbench made to honor the ancient powers.

geomancer_golem_workbench_recipe.flavor: Though grown from a smaller tree, this workbench allows access to much deeper powers.

dry_stone_greater_recipe.description: Four time as dry as a regular dry stone.
dry_stone_greater_recipe.flavor: Its thirst is even more unquenchable.

summon_stone_block_dirt_recipe.description: Summons an 8x5x8 block of dirt terrain.

summon_stone_block_mimic_recipe.description: Summons an 8x5x8 block of terrain that mimics whatever terrain it is placed on.

summon_stone_block_rock_recipe.description: Summons an 8x5x8 block of rock terrain.

summon_stone_block_surface_recipe.description: Summons an 8x5x8 block of surface terrain, such as grass or sand.

summon_stone_patch_dirt_recipe.description: Grows into a patch of dirt terrain, up to 12x12 units in size

summon_stone_patch_rock_recipe.description: Grows into a patch of rocky terrain, up to 12x12 units in size

summon_stone_patch_mimic_recipe.description: Grows into a patch of terrain, up to 12x12 units in size, that mimics the terrain it's placed on.

summon_stone_patch_surface_recipe.description: Grows into a patch of surface terrain, such as grass or sand, up to 12x12 units in size.

summon_stone_rock_field_recipe.description: Summons a pleasant field of rocks.

summon_stone_rune_site_recipe.description: Summons a clearing with a holy rune symbol.

summon_stone_vein_coal_recipe.description: Grows into a vein of coal

summon_stone_vein_copper_recipe.description: Grows into a vein of copper ore

summon_stone_vein_gold_recipe.description: Grows into a vein of gold ore

summon_stone_vein_iron_recipe.description: Grows into a vein of iron ore

summon_stone_vein_silver_recipe.description: Grows into a vein of silver ore

summon_stone_vein_tin_recipe.description: Grows into a vein of tin ore

wet_stone_greater_recipe.description: Four times more moist than a regular wet stone.
wet_stone_greater_recipe.flavor: The tears... they are tears of happiness.

earthbud_seeds_recipe.description: Separate the seeds from the buds
earthbud_seeds_recipe.flavor: Deseeded buds hold no magical power, but the seeds can be planted to grow anew.

summon_stone_sleeping_giant_recipe.description: Summons the memory of an ancient slumbering worker.

summon_stone_riverbed_dry_recipe.description: Summons the memory of an ancient river.

summon_stone_moon_recipe.description: Summons a pattern of a cute Moon.

summon_stone_sun_recipe.description: Summons a pattern of a cute Sun.

mason_description.description: The Mason crafts building materials and decorative items from stone.

workshop.name: Mason's Workshop
workshop.long_description: The Mason crafts building materials and decorative items from stone.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Mason can now make more elaborate items from stone.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Mason ventures from the realm of the functional into... art.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Mason can now make a solid array of basic furniture.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Mason may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Mason can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

mason_chisel.description: Tools of the trade for a mason.

mason_chisel_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a mason.

mason_hammer.description: Tools of the trade for a mason.

mason_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Mason for crafting.

bird_bath_recipe.description: A decorative stone vase with water for the birdies.

amberstone_lantern_recipe.flavor: Their thick walls blocked too much of their precious light underground, and so this style had all but vanished until now

amberstone_teapot_recipe.flavor: They are always rough at first, as if broken from the stone rather than carved. They are gradually worn smooth through generations of use.

amberstone_table_recipe.description: Chiseled in the style of clan Amberstone
amberstone_table_recipe.flavor: Rabbit masons will only part with work if they are proud of it

amberstone_tunnel_door_recipe.flavor: One could shove with all their might and these doors would never budge, but the rabbits could open them with barely a touch

amberstone_window_recipe.flavor: Living underground would be unbearable without excellent ventilation

blacksmith_hammer_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Blacksmith.
blacksmith_hammer_recipe.flavor: From the dragon that lives in the forge, weapons and armor, defense and conquest.

potter_cutter_recipe.description: Allows a hearthling to make tools and goods from clay.
potter_cutter_recipe.flavor: And Monkey struck the earth with his staff. 'For you are my children, he said, and you shall want for nothing.'

cobblestone_fence_gate_recipe.description: Its thick stone walls grant a sense of security.
cobblestone_fence_gate_recipe.flavor: Sheep go in, but can't get out!

cobblestone_fence_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

cook_spoon_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Cook.

gargoyle_recipe.description: Gothic-style carving to decorate your walls.
gargoyle_recipe.flavor: Remnants of the servants of Brelor, Crownless King.

stone_bench_recipe.description: Outdoor seating for moments of relaxation.
stone_bench_recipe.flavor: Pretty and functional. Matches the tombstones.

stone_brazier_recipe.description: A small firepit that provides comfort and warmth at night.
stone_brazier_recipe.flavor: Warning: Do not drop anything in while it's lit.

stone_bricks_recipe.description: A key component of stone structures like castles and roads.
stone_bricks_recipe.flavor: Tis a lucky thing, boy, that the square is the natural shape within most rocks. --Garen Knapper

stone_chair_recipe.description: Not horribly comfortable, but a symbol of status.

stone_chest_recipe.description: Imposing place to put up to 64 things.
stone_chest_recipe.flavor: 'Listen up, kid. All the chests in Hemgorir-Under-Mountain looked like this.'--Edolf, Wandering Bard

stone_garden_lantern_recipe.description: An ancient-looking lantern with great ambiance.

stone_maul_recipe.flavor: A modern adaptation of an ancient weapon.

stone_table_recipe.description: Its considerable weight gives it a sense of gravitas. For serious business only.
stone_table_recipe.flavor: No lions were harmed in its construction.

stone_wall_lantern_recipe.description: Attaches to the walls of buildings, providing light
stone_wall_lantern_recipe.flavor: Cons: Heavy. Pros: Unlikely to burn itself down.

tower_brazier_recipe.description: Fashioned after a castle tower, it provides a strong beacon at night.
tower_brazier_recipe.flavor: Great for lining garden paths and intimidating guests.

mason_workbench_recipe.description: Required to produce most of the Mason's recipes.
mason_workbench_recipe.flavor: Tappety-tap; Make the earth sing, Raise Brelor's ghost, Watch the mountain take wing.

mason_pedestal_amberstone_recipe.flavor: The skill of the mason can be read from the quality of their worktable

mason_pedestal_recipe.description: A well lit place for creating stone artwork.
mason_pedestal_recipe.flavor: Snap and spark, hiss of coal, light the way, transmute the earth whole.

stone_pile_recipe.description: A pile of rocks stacked together. An excellent way to store lots of stone for later use.

stone_tunnel_door_recipe.description: Useful for sealing off mine tunnels.

firepit_recipe.flavor: Fire is life, ashes are death, in these stones, the story of our people. -- Cid

valor_statue_recipe.description: A monument to your town's military might
valor_statue_recipe.flavor: The shield for resilience, and the sword for strength. -- Cid, Knight of the Old Ways

roadside_shrine_recipe.description: Place to show generosity and faith
roadside_shrine_recipe.flavor: Cid fashioned his breastplate into a basket and brought the wealth of the rich to the bedsides of the poor --Edison Arn, Church of Plenty

craftsman_statue_recipe.description: Shows each craftsman at their best
craftsman_statue_recipe.flavor: A good crafter never blames his tools, only the people who make his tools. --Otto Crankfrown, Guildmaster Emeritus

gold_flakes_recipe.description: Used when crafting furniture to make it really pretty!

gold_flakes_times_three_recipe.description: Smash up a Gold Bar to get the Flakes back out of it!

wet_stone_recipe.flavor: This stone has been blessed with the tears of Rayya!
wet_stone_recipe.description: This stone will shed water around itself.

output_box_amberstone_recipe.description: Temporarily displays a crafter's hard work
output_box_amberstone_recipe.flavor: These shelves are quite sturdy. You could jump on them if you wanted. ...please do not.

output_box_stone_recipe.flavor: Crafters love to show off their work!

input_bin_stone_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_bin_stone_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_shelf_wall_stone_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_shelf_wall_stone_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_shelf_ground_stone_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_shelf_ground_stone_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_corner_ground_stone_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_corner_ground_stone_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_table_ground_stone_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_table_ground_stone_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

sign_mason_recipe.description: A heavy stone sign, to be displayed outside a mason's workshop
sign_mason_recipe.flavor: Probably wouldn't even swing in a hurricane

statue_rabbit_flat_recipe.flavor: It's considered lucky to stack a vegetable from each harvest on these statues' backs - lucky for the real rabbits, anyway.

statue_rabbit_recipe.flavor: Just like the huge stone guardian rabbits, except wee.

fountain_tiered_recipe.flavor: It's fun to watch leaves race down the falls. It's less fun to scoop them all out later.

fountain_recipe.flavor: Tastefully tiered, and remarkably free of algae

fountain_garden_recipe.description: A tiny, floating garden for a quiet corner
fountain_garden_recipe.flavor: To be small enough to hide away in its blossoms for an afternoon...

door_mason_recipe.description: Fit for a master mason's workshop
door_mason_recipe.flavor: Feels like knocking on a mountainside

fountain_wishing_recipe.flavor: The exact rate of exchange has never been clear, but who cares it's fun

statue_knight_recipe.flavor:
"...Now quietly the land they keep
amid the brightbells echoing."

statue_knight_male_recipe.flavor:
"Holding back the darkness deep;
shaking iron, steel blades ring..."

portcullis_valor_recipe.description: For times when only the strongest door will do.
portcullis_valor_recipe.flavor: Stone for strength, Iron for versatility, Coal to paint fear into our enemy's hearts.

valor_window_arrow_short_recipe.description: For those who enjoy small compressed views.

valor_window_arrow_tall_recipe.description: For those who enjoy small compressed views.

valor_window_frame_barred_recipe.description: For those who enjoy safe viewing from behind bars.

valor_window_frame_xlarge_recipe.description: For those who enjoy wide expansive views.
valor_window_frame_xlarge_recipe.flavor: I'm not the sort of person who'd tell you what to do with your window, but when Riley stuck it on the first floor like a door, rabbits poured straight into his kitchen. -- Andie, Berry Farmer

valor_brazier_large_recipe.description: A beacon of light to protect your town.
valor_brazier_large_recipe.flavor: From a tall mountaintop, you can see fires like these all across the Darkmoor.

lucid_gem_recipe.description: A spiritual focus, essential for the Shining Circlet
lucid_gem_recipe.flavor: What mysteries hide inside its tranquil blue eye?

giants_shield_recipe.flavor: Against even the most terrible foes and impossible dangers, this shield will never break.

titan_ward_stone_recipe.description: Hurts anything nearby that smells like titan.
titan_ward_stone_recipe.flavor: Baby don't hurt me! Don't hurt me no more!

cobblestone_fence_end_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

cobblestone_fence_bar_single_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

cobblestone_fence_bar_double_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

stone_bed_recipe.description: A bed to call your own after a hard day's work
stone_bed_recipe.flavor: The decorative frame might distract you from the discomfort of sleeping on hard stone

stone_window_frame_wide_wood_recipe.recipe_name: Wide Wood and Stone Window Frame

stone_window_frame_wood_recipe.flavor: Is this what they call a cross section?

stone_window_frame_tall_recipe.description: Extra height adds an air of elegance.

stone_lantern_simple_recipe.description: Nothing fancy. Attach to any wall.
stone_lantern_simple_recipe.flavor: Cons: Heavy. Pros: Unlikely to burn itself down.

stone_garden_lantern_simple_recipe.description: It has a classic handle...mostly for decoration.
stone_garden_lantern_simple_recipe.flavor: It's weight makes it useless to carrying around.

stone_torch_recipe.description: A wall-mounted torch with slowly burning oil.
stone_torch_recipe.flavor: Makes it much easier to burn the midnight oil.

stone_candle_holder_recipe.flavor: Romantic for some, annoying to read by for others.

stone_door_2_recipe.flavor: This here pattern, I learned from the Squarefolk.

stone_double_door_recipe.description: Two doors are better than one.
stone_double_door_recipe.flavor: Some people want to make an entrance... every day.

stone_window_frame_crossbeam_recipe.flavor: Is this what they call a cross section?

cobblestone_fence_combo_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

stone_floor_candle_holder_recipe.flavor: Romantic for some, spookily haunted for others.

golem_parts_recipe.description: Used by the Geomancer to craft golems
golem_parts_recipe.flavor: Sturdy enough to hold an ox.

window_box_violet_recipe.description: A planter box full of Violet flowers, built to be placed below window frames.
window_box_violet_recipe.flavor: The capstone of a civilized dwelling.

market_shelf_tall_ground_stone.description: Other players and Travellers can buy goods stocked on these shelves.
market_shelf_tall_ground_stone.flavor: One Hearthling's trash is another's treasure... right?

potter_description.description: Makes useful goods from clay. Upgradeable to the Mason

workshop.name: Potter's Wheel
workshop.long_description: The Potter crafts useful goods and decorative items from clay.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Potter may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Potter can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

level_6_data.title: Master Potter
level_6_data.perk_000_description: The Potter has rediscovered ancient secrets of the Phoenix...

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Potter can now make decorative items to liven up the town or sell for money.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Potter can now add precious metals to vases and tiles.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Potter can now make basic furniture and building adornments.

small_urn_recipe.description: For compactly storing up to 8 items
small_urn_recipe.flavor: Mischevious kids break these pots all the time, looking for treasure.

large_urn_recipe.description: For compactly storing up to 32 items
large_urn_recipe.flavor: Once we put things in, how will we get them out? Don't think about it too much

clay_lamp_recipe.description: Its flame brings a warm glow at night.
clay_lamp_recipe.flavor: And the Djinni said to Rayya: 'I have but one last wish to grant. Word it well.'

clay_wall_lamp_recipe.description: Its flame brings a warm glow at night.
clay_wall_lamp_recipe.flavor: 'Close round us guard the spirits of night! As they dance and sway, free you'll be to dream the dark away.'

potter_workbench_recipe.description: Helps the potter create simple items from clay
potter_workbench_recipe.flavor: Where we've been before, we'll be again, round once more, for strength and then--

potter_kiln_recipe.flavor: 'Through heat and hardship we realize our final selves.' -Silora, Acolyte of Rayya's Mystery

clay_safety_standard_recipe.description: Use to designate a safety point
clay_safety_standard_recipe.flavor: To achieve an ideal standard of living, find safety in numbers. --Mysteries and Proverbs, V

clay_bricks_recipe.description: A stack of bricks, used to make clay structures.
clay_bricks_recipe.flavor: 'And when Clay emerged from the Kiln, he had become Brick, and no matter how hard Sun blasted him, he remained cheerful.'

red_clay_door_recipe.flavor: "The red hints at a mystery, allure. What lies beyond yon red door?" -- Ember Iskender, Dept of Applied Poetry

red_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: "Industry standard for a reason" -- Jorya Iskender, Dyemaster

blue_clay_door_recipe.description: Blue like the dream of distant ocean.
blue_clay_door_recipe.flavor: 'It's a door. What more could we possibly say?' --Joni Iskender, Marketing Apprentice

green_clay_door_recipe.description: Green, like the few scrub in the desert.
green_clay_door_recipe.flavor: 'Can you make the hole a bit smaller? The point is to see who it is without giving away that I'm home.' --Vara Tenter, Irate Customer

blue_clay_window_frame_recipe.description: Lets in the bright desert air.
blue_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: The dye is named Santori, for an acolyte who longed for the ocean.

green_clay_window_frame_recipe.description: Let's in the soft desert air.
green_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: It's a window's dream of spring...

latticed_clay_window_frame_recipe.description: The lattice still lets the good air in.
latticed_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: As the shadows move across the floor, child, see if you can find Monkey!

clay_bed_recipe.description: Uncomfortable, but it gets you off the ground
clay_bed_recipe.flavor: "It's like a pot, for sleeping!" - Clarence, Temporary Salesperson

clay_dining_table_recipe.description: Gets your food off the ground!

simple_clay_chair_recipe.flavor: 'Nests with the tables, ooo, symbolic!' --Nestor Adya, Acolyte

decorative_teapot_recipe.flavor: 'Wherever she went, the teapot did too, and even when there was nothing but cold water to put in, always out poured steaming tea, redolent with the aroma of Elsewhere.'

decorative_tray_recipe.flavor: 'Sugar, spice, and blood of the earth: it is the tray that brings them, and us, together' --Rayya

potted_cactus_recipe.description: Plant a cactus in a clay pot.

blown_glass_vase_recipe.flavor: They say Monkey had one eye made of glass, and through it, he could see straight to the heart of things. --Master Orlen

decorative_vase_recipe.flavor: It is the riches of the earth reborn

sundial_recipe.flavor: The secret to immortality is to make best of days last forever --Rayya

tile_floor_mosaic_recipe.flavor: Step over the painted flowers, and give thanks

golden_clay_wall_planter_recipe.flavor: Where do the flowers come from? From the planter, of course! --Acolyte of Rayya's Mystery

unfired_clay_vase_recipe.description: A simple vase made on the pottery wheel that is used for more complex recipes.
unfired_clay_vase_recipe.flavor: 'The First Pot was formed together by wind, earth, and fire, connecting the people to Hearth' --Master Orlen

clay_pile_recipe.description: A pile of clay stacked together. An excellent way to store lots of clay for later use.
clay_pile_recipe.flavor: Amazing, honestly, that it comes apart again.

clay_market_stall_recipe.description: Merchants can visit this stall to buy and sell goods
clay_market_stall_recipe.flavor: 'Cut off his hand? For theft? What would be the point?' --Talidor Roq, Knight of Mysteries

clay_tunnel_door_recipe.description: Useful for sealing off mine tunnels.
clay_tunnel_door_recipe.flavor: Speak friend and enter.... oh no wait it's not locked. - Eber, Potter's Apprentice

tan_latticed_window_recipe.description: The latticed window you know and love, in tan
tan_latticed_window_recipe.flavor: "Lets in the bugs, but at least not the really big ones!" -- Drenkar Iskender, Ex-Marketing Associate

tall_clay_window_recipe.description: Still lets in the soft desert air
tall_clay_window_recipe.flavor: "Windowsill can cool a really tall pie" -Aaryn, Pragmatist

tan_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: "No, I didn't forget the dye." -Isfan Dorret, Inventor of Achromatism

green_latticed_window_recipe.flavor: Reminicent of a vine-covered treehouse window, faded into memory
green_latticed_window_recipe.description: The latticed window you know and love, now in green!

blue_latticed_window_recipe.flavor: "No but really, where is this dye coming from?" -- Farah, Professional Bugcatcher

wooden_sign_potter_recipe.flavor: Less fragile and easier than hanging a real pot!

output_box_clay_recipe.flavor: Crafters love to show off their work!

input_bin_clay_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_bin_clay_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_shelf_ground_clay_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_shelf_ground_clay_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_shelf_wall_clay_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_table_ground_clay_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_table_ground_clay_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_bin_clay_blue_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_bin_clay_blue_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_bin_clay_red_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_bin_clay_red_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_bin_clay_green_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_bin_clay_green_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

blazing_inlay_recipe.description: Radiant gilding for the Emblazoned Sword.

titan_ward_clay_recipe.description: Hurts anything nearby that smells like titan.
titan_ward_clay_recipe.flavor: Baby don't hurt me! Don't hurt me no more!

golem_parts_recipe.description: Used by the Geomancer to craft golems
golem_parts_recipe.flavor: Sturdy enough to hold an ox.

clay_fence_gate_recipe.flavor: This decorative gate protects your fences from being broken.

market_shelf_tall_ground_clay.description: Other players and Travellers can buy goods stocked on these shelves.
market_shelf_tall_ground_clay.flavor: One Hearthling's trash is another's treasure... right?

potter_kiln_ghost.description: Produces bricks and goods from clay.

potter_cutter.description: Used to form civilization from dirt!

potter_cutter_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Potter.

potter_outfit.description: Earth splotches are part of its intense style.

shepherd_description.description: Domesticates wild animals and harvests them for food and materials.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Wild animals are more likely to appear whenever the shepherd is looking for them.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The shepherd is now more adept at getting the flock to walk a tiny bit faster.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The shepherd finds comfort in long walks and feeding the animals, making them less likely to stop and converse.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The shepherd's skill produces greater yields in animal products.

shepherd_crook_iconic.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Shepherd.

shepherd_crook_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Shepherd.

shepherd_pasture.description: Shepherds bring animals to these locations and tend to them here.

trapper_description.description: The Trapper's snares capture and (ahem) "harvest" small critters for a reliable source of food and supplies.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Long walks have increased the trapper's foot speed.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Long practice helps the trapper salvage more from each animal.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The trapper will occasionally choose to turn a particularly fine animal into a pet!
level_2_data.perk_001_description: The trapper now qualifies for advanced jobs. Click the promote command for details.

level_6_data.title: Master Trapper
level_6_data.perk_000_description: The trapper has a thing or two to teach the Engineer about setting traps. Increases town trap limit by 6.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: Better trap arming skills increase the trapper's chance for capturing prey by 25%.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The trapper has become more efficient at packing in the loot.
level_4_data.perk_001_description: When downed, the trapper keeps themselves alive much longer while waiting for rescue

speed_1_buff.description: Long walks have increased the trapper's foot speed.

survivalist_1_buff.description: The trapper can stay downed for much longer than most before giving up the ghost.

trapper_knife_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Trapper.

trapping_grounds.description: Trappers catch critters for food and resources in this zone.

weaver_description.description: The Weaver makes thread, fabrics and hangings from fiber and dye.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Weaver is now skillful enough to use materials created by other crafters.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Weaver can now make basic hangings and decor.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Weaver may now craft an especially Fine quality of decoration.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Weaver can now create decorations of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality decorations more often.

amberstone_chair_recipe.description: Woven in the style of clan Amberstone
amberstone_chair_recipe.flavor: Designed especially to keep fluffy bunny tails off of cold, stone floors

amberstone_chest_recipe.flavor: A tidy space is a happy space!

amberstone_mat_recipe.description: Woven with the skill of the rabbits
amberstone_mat_recipe.flavor: The style of weave requires deep concentration and quick, quick little paws

amberstone_painting_branch_recipe.description: Depicts a tree from cycles past
amberstone_painting_branch_recipe.flavor: What they could not bring with them into exile, the rabbits found ways to preserve

banner_wall_big_recipe.description: Show your town pride with this decorative banner.

banner_wall_small_recipe.description: Show your town pride with this small banner.

bolt_of_cloth_recipe.description: Used to create more comfortable furniture.
bolt_of_cloth_recipe.flavor: To make thicker by the width of one string: add string. Repeat 1,000,000 times.

cloth_bolt_recipe.description: Used to create more comfortable furniture.
cloth_bolt_recipe.flavor: To make thicker by the width of one string: add string. Repeat 1,000,000 times.

cloth_padded_vest_recipe.description: This triple-quilted vest provides more protection to your combat units than mere clothing. Not a lot more, but every little bit helps, right?

curtains_recipe.description: Dresses up an otherwise ordinary window.

fur_rug_recipe.description: A warm and cozy rug, sewn from various animal pelts.
fur_rug_recipe.flavor: Perfect for an evening by the fire.

leather_bolt_recipe.description: Prepared sheets of leather, ready to be put to good use.
leather_bolt_recipe.flavor: You can hardly see the individual sources.

leather_vest_recipe.description: Hardened leather provides study protection against light weapons.

plushie_toy_rabbit_recipe.description: A toy... for children of course.

spool_of_thread_recipe.description: Needed for cloth. Warm and fluffy
spool_of_thread_recipe.flavor: Each gram of fiber yearns to become a sweater.

tapestry_wall_recipe.description: A decorative scene, woven in colored thread and cord.
tapestry_wall_recipe.flavor: What you see in its knotted depths tells you something about yourself.

thread_recipe.description: Needed for cloth. Warm and fluffy
thread_recipe.flavor: Each gram of fiber yearns to become a sweater.

throw_rug_recipe.description: Brightens up that old dusty floor.

worker_outfit_2_recipe.description: Double stitching and strategically placed padding improves the worker's efficiency. The worker who dons this upgrade outfit will move faster.

worker_outfit_winter_recipe.description: A heavy wool coat, for cold winter nights. The worker who dons this upgrade outfit will move faster.

weaver_loom_recipe.description: Add thread to thread till cloth results.
weaver_loom_recipe.flavor: Patient Spider, weaver, writer, draws the tapestry of fate tighter. --Rayya's Rhyme

weaver_spinning_wheel_recipe.description: Spins prickly, scratchy, chaos into thread.
weaver_spinning_wheel_recipe.flavor: Spider smiles; all eight eyes glitter, 'Something from nothing, some sweet and some bitter.'

weaver_workbench_recipe.description: Used to make complex crafts of thread and fabric.
weaver_workbench_recipe.flavor: In the beginning there was nothing, and then there was Spider.

simple_quiver_recipe.description: A quiver equippable by an archer. Stores freezing arrows that will slow enemies

fire_quiver_recipe.description: Gives an Archer access to fire arrows, which deal damage over time

cloth_padded_helmet_recipe.flavor: Were they phoenix wings, or serpent wings?

input_bin_amberstone_recipe.flavor: Would-be masons of clan amberstone must practice discerning quality stone for many years before they are allowed near a chisel. Many never are.

input_bin_woven_recipe.description: A versatile container that Hearthlings will try to keep full, so your crafters can keep on working!
input_bin_woven_recipe.flavor: Nothing quite like a well-supplied workshop!

input_bin_woven_blue_recipe.flavor: Nothing quite like a well-supplied workshop!
input_bin_woven_blue_recipe.description: A versatile container that Hearthlings will try to keep full, so your crafters can keep on working!

input_bin_woven_green_recipe.flavor: Nothing quite like a well-supplied workshop!
input_bin_woven_green_recipe.description: A versatile container that Hearthlings will try to keep full, so your crafters can keep on working!

input_bin_woven_red_recipe.flavor: Nothing quite like a well-supplied workshop!
input_bin_woven_red_recipe.description: A versatile container that Hearthlings will try to keep full, so your crafters can keep on working!

silver_bowstring_recipe.description: A spool of strong, spun silver cord
silver_bowstring_recipe.flavor: Joins the ends of the Empire Bow

woven_grip_recipe.description: Tightly wrapped in cords of blue and gold
woven_grip_recipe.flavor: Adorns the hilt of the Emblazoned Sword

golem_backpack_recipe.description: Used by the Geomancer to craft Ox Golems

weaver_loom_ghost.description: Used to weave thread into cloth.

weaver_spindle_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Weaver

weaver_spinning_wheel_ghost.description: Used to spin fiber into thread.

weaver_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Weaver for crafting.

worker_description.description: Workers perform basic tasks like harvesting resources, hauling stuff around, and constructing buildings.
worker_description.requirements: None, just hard work and guts.

winter_worker_outfit.description: A heavy wool coat, for cold winter nights.  Improves speed.

worker_outfit_2.description: Reinforced construction improves worker efficiency!  Improves speed.

herbalist_description.description: Heals units with crafted balms and bandages.

workshop.name: Herbalist Lab
workshop.description: Allows the Herbalist to craft healing balms and bandages.
workshop.long_description: Allows the Herbalist to craft healing balms and bandages.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Herbalist can attend to 2 hurt hearthlings at a time.
level_1_data.perk_001_description: The Herbalist channels the spirits of the forest and gains natural regeneration. Willpower and Diligence increased.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Herbalist is now skillful enough to use materials created by the other crafters.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Herbalist can now attend to up to 4 hearthlings at a time.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The Herbalist's medical prowess increases the effectiveness of healing items by 50%.

herbalist_staff.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Herbalist

herbalist_staff_iconic.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Herbalist

herbalist_staff_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Herbalist

herbalist_workbench_recipe.description: Allows the Herbalist to craft healing balms and bandages.

small_healing_tonic_recipe.description: A medicinal drink that heals for a minuscule amount

stamina_tonic_recipe.description: Buffs stamina of all hearthlings for a short while

strength_tonic_recipe.description: Buffs muscle of all hearthlings for a short while

coarse_bandage_recipe.description: Used by the herbalist to heal for a small amount

heavy_bandage_recipe.description: Used by the herbalist to provide a lot of healing. Good for heavy wounds.

light_bandage_recipe.description: Used by the herbalist to heal a moderate amount

courage_tonic_recipe.description: Increases the courage of all town citizens for a short while.

energy_tonic_recipe.description: This tonic will make your town citizens less sleepy and move faster for a short while.

cleric_tome_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling to a cleric

topiary_rabbit_recipe.flavor: I know it grows back, but I hate to pick its tail...

topiary_mammoth_recipe.flavor: I swear I just saw it blink

topiary_fox_recipe.description: Much better for pie than jerky
topiary_fox_recipe.flavor: Don't plant it in your poyo coop

pot_goldrose_recipe.flavor: Goldrose tea is an old-fashioned pick-me-up. It apparently tastes different for everyone.

pot_moondrop_recipe.flavor: Never press or dry the flowers. Enjoy them now, and look forward to the next ones.

pot_redbloom_recipe.flavor: A Redbloom bouquet invites fortune, the nature of which depends on the number of flowers. Be very careful.

tree_goldrose_recipe.flavor: Favored among travelers, goldroses carry the warmth of hearth and home

tree_moondrop_recipe.flavor: Moondrops symbolize a journey's close, and new beginnings. They bloom at the turn of the page

tree_redbloom_recipe.flavor: Redblooms are for luck. An odd number of petals is especially lucky, though no one's ever seen such a blossom.

leaf_setting_recipe.description: Delicately frames and protects the Shining Circlet
leaf_setting_recipe.flavor: Cast from actual leaves in layers of silver and gold, they're stronger than they look

tumbleweed_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the fiber is destroyed in the process.

wintermoss_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the fiber is destroyed in the process.

sweet_potato_transmute_recipe.flavor: This doesn't require so much of a skilled hand as simply cutting the potatoes into wedges and sticking them into the ground.

snow_poppy_transmute_recipe.description: Pluck the seeds from the flower
snow_poppy_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the herbs are lost in the process.

willpower_1_buff.description: The herbalist has improved health regeneration and diligence

herbalist_pestle.description: Tools of the trade for an herbalist.

herbalist_mortar.description: Tools of the trade for an herbalist.

cleric_outfit.description: Holy garb worn by the devout few

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The cleric's presence heals everyone around them periodically
level_1_data.perk_001_description: The cleric's presence improves the muscle of those around them

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Increased compassion for increased direct healing

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Healing aura power and radius increased

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The cleric has mastered the art of healing. Compassion greatly increased.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The cleric's presence greatly improves the muscle of those around them

cleric_tome_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling to a Cleric

cleric_tome.description: Contains sacred texts on the way of the cleric

heal_aura_1_buff.description: The cleric's presence heals everyone around them periodically

minor_muscle_aura_buff.description: Increases strength of those around by a small amount

minor_muscle_aura_effect_buff.description: Strength improved slightly from the presence of a cleric

heal_aura_2_buff.description: The cleric's presence heals everyone around them periodically.

major_muscle_aura_buff.description: Greatly increases the muscle of those around

major_muscle_aura_effect_buff.description: Muscle improved greatly from the presence of a cleric

legendary_circlet_buff.description: Increases Willpower, Courage, and Compassion by 10%

magmasmith_hammer_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling to a Magmasmith

magmasmith_forge_ghost.description: Like a normal forge, except a lot hotter

knight_outfit.description: Metal armor worn by a knight

knight_description.description: A defensive combatant focused on protecting allies from harm.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Increases Stamina, Courage, and draws attention from monsters
level_1_data.perk_001_description: The knight gains an additional 10% defense from equipment

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The knight gains an additional 20% armor from equipment

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The knight boosts courage of everyone around

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The knight intimidates the opponent, drawing the attention of nearby enemies.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The knight sounds a horn of combat, drawing the attention enemies both near and far

defense_1_buff.description: Defense gained from equipment increased by 10%

defense_2_buff.description: Defense gained from equipment increased by 20%

health_1_buff.description: The knight becomes more menacing to enemies, drawing their attention in combat. They also get a health and stamina bonus to keep up.

courage_aura_buff.description: The knight increases courage of everyone around

courage_aura_effect_buff.description: Courage increased from the presence of a knight.

knight_helm.description: Iron headgear standard issue for all knights

decay_1.description: Starting to Rot. Better eat it fast.
Starting to go bad. Better cook it soon.
Starting to go bad. Better cook it soon.

step001.title: Click the Zones button
step001.description: Zones define what happens where in your town

step000.title: We've harvested some wood
step000.description: Now we need someplace to store it

step003.title: Click the check to confirm
step003.description: Use the filters to determine what type of items you want to go into the stockpile

step002.title: Click the Create Stockpile button
step002.description: Hearthlings store your items in stockpiles

scenario_data.message: If we're going to get this town off the ground, we'll need wood, and lots of it! Chop down some nearby trees to get logs.
scenario_data.completed_message: Congratulations! We've got some wood resources now. Logs and other natural resources can be used to construct buildings and craft items. They're the first building blocks for advancing your town.
scenario_data.title: Initial Supplies

step001.title: Click the Gather button
step001.description: Use the gather button to chop down trees

step000.title: Click the Harvest menu button
step000.description: Use the Harvest menu to gather resources from the world

step006.title: Click stamper to approve the promotion

step004.title: Click Change Jobs to promote this hearthling to a different job

step001.title: Open the Citizens manager
step001.description: Use this pane to manage all your citizens, view their stats, and set their task orders.

step000.title: Promote a Hearthling to a Carpenter
step000.description: We have logs and a place to store goods, but the town is looking pretty empty. Fortunately, we've brought a saw along with us. Let's promote a citizen to a Carpenter!

step007.title: Town Crafters
step007.description: Carpenters and other crafters can create various goods to help your settlement, from beds, to building materials, to weapons.

step003.title: Mouse over the numbers to learn what each attribute does
step003.description: Each hearthling has a Mind, Body, and Spirit attribute that affects how well they do certain things.
